K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:1b-1: bam po nyi shu bdun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:1b-2: grum stod ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:1b-3: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te; de'i tshe nags khrod cig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:1b-4: de dag de na 'khod cing me'i sbyin sreg byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-1: bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-2: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-3: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-5: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-6: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2a-7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-0: rnam par thar pa brgyad la @2b bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-1: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-2: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-3: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni; chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-4: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:2b-16: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3a-2: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3a-4: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3a-6: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-0: su ni; dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar @3b bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-2: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-3: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-4: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-5: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-6: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-8: drang srong lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis me'i sbyin sreg gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-9: thab de dag thams cad kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes mthong la de phan chad me sbar mi nus pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-10: de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-11: rjes 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis me'i thab rnams kyi nang du me sbar mi nus par gyur pa las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-13: dge ba zhig yin pa 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-14: rjes 'di lha chen po'i rjes ma yin grang snyam nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rjes de dag la bsreg bya phul nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin sreg de dag rang 'bar bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-15: me lce tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug par song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:3b-16: de nas drang srong rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te lha chen pos bdag la dgongs so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams drang @4a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-1: ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal la thug pa'i bar du zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-2: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-4: lam 'dir gshegs so snyam nas zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu rjes de dag la mchod pa byed cing dong nas de dag mthar gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-6: de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-7: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-8: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-9: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-10: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-11: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-12: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4a-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba de ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-0: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba @4b de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-1: de ltar mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-6: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-7: des na drang srong de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so; ;de dag gis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-9: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-10: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-11: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de rnams la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:4b-13: de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-1: thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-2: de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-3: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-4: tsan dang spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-5: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-6: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-7: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-8: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smras pa'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-9: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong 'di rnams zhabs kyi rjes bstan pas drangs te g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-12: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-14: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5a-15: 'das pa'i dus na yang drang srong lnga brgya po 'di rnams ji ltar zhabs kyi rjes bstan pas drangs te rab tu phyung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad du bcug pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-0: sngon byung ba @5b 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-1: bde bar gshegs pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-3: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste; der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe des skye bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-5: drang srong lnga brgya po de dag drang ba'i phyir rtags su rung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-6: de'i tshe lho phyogs na dka' thub kyi nags shig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag steng gi bar snang las ri spos kyi ngad ldang la chas te dong ba las de dag ri rab la rdugs pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes rnams kyi steng du rdugs nas de rnams ya mtshan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-7: bdag cag rdzu 'phrul yang ma nyams la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-8: nam mkha' la yang thogs par gyur to snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-9: de nas de dag la dga' ba'i lhas de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:5b-12: khyed kyi 'og na sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes yod la de'i steng du ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-0: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pas @6a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-2: de nas drang srong de rnams zhabs kyi rjes de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-3: dga' bar gyur nas sa la babs te zhabs kyi rjes de dag la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de rnams drang ba'i phyir drang srong gnas pa la thug pa'i bar du zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas drang srong rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-8: lam 'dir gshegs so snyam nas rjes de thog thag tu drang srong gnas par dong nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-9: mthong nas kyang de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6a-10: dga' bar gyur nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-0: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la @6b rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-1: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-2: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo; ;de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dag rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de rnams la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-3: de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang gang gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob nas 'chi khar de dag gis smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-4: 'di ltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang gang gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-6: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-7: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-10: de'i tshe drang srong lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:6b-11: drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-0: de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par @7a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-1: spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-3: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-4: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-6: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-10: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-11: mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so;; ;;long ba zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-12: bcom ldan 'das yul mi thi la na lha chen po'i aa mra'i tshal na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-13: de'i tshe yul mi thi la na khyim bdag sna tshogs can zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7a-14: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-0: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des @7b thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-1: de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-2: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-4: bu byad ngan po long ba zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-5: de nas khyim bdag des bu de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-6: de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis sdug bsngal chen po skyes te bdag cag gnyis brgya lam lan gcig na bu btsas kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-7: bdag cag gnyis la bu byad ngan po long ba 'di lta bu mi dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-8: phyem red nam sros na phyir phyung la khyi rnams la sbyin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-9: zhes byas nas pha ma gnyis kyis de phyir phyung ste lam po cher bor nas khyi rnams la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-11: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-12: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-14: 'gro ba lngar 'gre ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-15: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-16: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-17: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-18: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:7b-19: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-0: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen @8a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-2: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-3: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-15: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-23: ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-25: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-27: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed pa bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-31: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-33: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon kyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-35: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-36: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas; ;dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-37: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-38: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8a-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-0: khye'u 'di lung @8b bstan pa'i dus la bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-1: khye'u 'di la brten nas gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo mang po drang bar bya dgos so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas khye'u de khyis bza' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das nang par sngar bzhengs nas sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas yul mi thi lar gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-3: bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dang 'dabs nye ba zhig tu bzhugs so; ;de nas yul mi thi la na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-4: mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur te sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-6: ma la bdag gis ci nas khye'u 'dis tshe snga ma dran par 'gyur zhing tshig kyang smra la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-7: nga dang lhan cig tu gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-8: snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byin gyis brlabs te khye'u des sngon gyi tsher rabs dran nas tshig smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:8b-9: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig gtam zer bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-0: der bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de @9a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-3: khyod mi sdug pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-7: khyod mi sdug pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-11: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa nyams su myong ba yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-14: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa nyams su myong ba mchis lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-16: khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-19: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che rnams ya mtshan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-20: sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la tshig kyang smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-21: bcom ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba su zhig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-23: snyan slebs par dka' ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-24: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs ma thub nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-26: sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs kyang dran la tshig smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9a-27: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig gtam zer ba 'di su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-0: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' @9b ngos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-4: snyan slebs par dka' bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-5: bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs mi thub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-8: bdag gis kyang snyan slebs par dka' ba yin mod kyi; khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-9: zhes byas nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-11: sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la tshig smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-12: bcom ldan 'das dang bka' mchid bgyid pa su lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-16: sdig pa byed byed pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-17: 'dis sdig pa'i las mang po byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-19: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul mi thi la 'di nyid na rgyal po mi sdug pa zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:9b-20: rgyal po de phrag dog can can zhig tu gyur nas de gang gi tshe btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas nas skyed mos tshal gyi sa'am gzhan gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa na de'i lam thams cad du mi med par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-1: kyang yol ba stug pos gcod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-2: brgya la 'ga' zhig gis glo bur du btsun mo'i 'khor mthong na des de'i mig 'byin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-3: de lta bu'i tshul gyis des sems can mang po mig med par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-4: de nas phyi zhig na de btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten na mi bzhugs pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-6: bas mtha'i gnas mal na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-7: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu bse ru lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-8: rang sangs rgyas shig lam de nas 'ongs pa de rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams kyis ma tshor nas de de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun du bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-9: bud med de dag gis de'i lus mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-10: sems mdzes pa mthong nas de dag dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-11: dga' bar gyur nas gdong g-yogs pa phye ste btud cing phyag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-12: de nas rgyal pos kyang de thos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-13: thos ma thag tu de phrag dog gi gzhi las khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-14: de khros nas rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams la bka' stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10a-15: khyed dengs la rab tu byung ba de'i mig gnyis phyung zhig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-0: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams kyis rang sangs @10b rgyas de bzung nas mig gnyis phyung ste rang sangs rgyas de yang sngon gyi las myong bar 'gyur ba de mngon sum du gyur pas rdzu ba yang ma dran na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-2: de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-4: smras shing nyams par gyur te 'khor ba na 'khor zhing yun ring por sdug bsngal chen po rnyed na mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-5: 'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam ste steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-8: glog 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-9: so so'i skye bo rnams ni; rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-10: rgyal po de sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-11: skal pa chen po dang ldan pa mar spyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-12: bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-13: bdag nyid chen po de yang gzhi des yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-14: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byed du bcug pa'i las de'i 'bras bu bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-15: 'di ltar phyir yang bkur sti byas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:10b-16: bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-0: @11a *// 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-1: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-2: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-5: de'i tshe rgyal po mi sdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-6: long ba 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-7: der rang sangs rgyas de'i mig gnyis phyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-8: sems can stong phrag du ma'i mig med par byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo brgya phrag du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-9: lo stong phrag du mar dmus long 'ba' zhig tu gyur te sems can dmyal bar yang skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-10: de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dvags su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-11: der yang 'dis dmus long du gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-12: yi dvags las shi 'phos nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 'gror skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-13: der yang dmus long 'ba' zhig tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-14: dud 'gro las shi 'phos nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mir skyes te thams cad du dmus long du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-15: de nas dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11a-17: sems can sdug bsngal 'di las nam thar par 'gyur lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid bzang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-3: de'i gsung rab la sems can 'di mir skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-5: de nas de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-6: des dgra bcom pa thob kyang nyal ba'i tshe las las skyes pa'i bya rog dag lhags nas mig gnyis 'byin par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-7: de gzhi de las yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-8: der las 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-9: de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo bar gyur par thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-11: des na skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-12: dro bar gyur pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-15: bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-16: 'jig rten gyi chos gyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-17: mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:11b-19: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-1: gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-3: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-5: rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-9: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-15: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-20: 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-23: dge 'dun la bab par gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-24: gcer bu pa 'od srung zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-25: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-26: de'i tshe ri khrod cig na bram ze dbul po zhig gnas pa de zhing las kyis 'tsho bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-27: de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-28: bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12a-29: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-0: khye'u 'di 'od srung gi @12b rigs yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-1: khye'u 'di'i ming 'od srung du gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-3: de nas khye'u 'od srung 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-7: mar gyi snying khu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe de pa dang lhan cig tu zhing las la 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-9: pha des srog chags stong phrag du ma kha 'dog par byed pa mthong nas pha la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-11: khyod kyis srog chags stong phrag du ma gyi na la sdug bsngal bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i 'tsho ba khyod la ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-13: bu; bdag cag gi 'tsho ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-16: de nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-17: bdag 'tsho ba 'di lta bu btang la nags khrod du gnas bca'o snyam nas nges par 'byung bar chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-18: de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas mthar gyis gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-19: rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa kun tu rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-21: khye'u 'od srung gis kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:12b-22: de bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-0: zhes thos nas thos ma thag @13a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-1: tu pha ma la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-3: bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-5: de nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro zhes byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-6: des der gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu mthong nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-7: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-8: 'di yin no snyam nas de de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-9: rab tu byung nas kyang des ltas kyi dpyad lobs nas de de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-10: de nas de'i ming 'od srung zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur te ming gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa zhes bya bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-11: phyi zhig na des bdag nyid tshe zad pa'i rtags mthong nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-13: zhag bdun na med par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba'i lhas de la sbran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-15: gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa mi dgar ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-18: 'chi ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam ston pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-20: rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid na bzhugs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-21: de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13a-22: de ltar byas dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-0: de nas de thos ma thag tu gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa @13b rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal logs su chas pa las lam phyed du de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-2: ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-5: de dag dang mngon sum du phrad du 'gro mi phod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-6: bdag re zhig 'od ma'i tshal du mi 'gro bar lam phyed 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-7: lam phyed 'di nyid du 'dug bzhin du bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bsnyen bskur bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig bu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-9: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-10: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-12: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-13: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:13b-14: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-12: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-18: de'i grags pa kun tu rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-19: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis w'a ra na sir gnas bcas te bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-20: bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-21: de'i tsha yul de na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gnas pa des kyang w'a ra n'a si na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:19b-22: bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-1: so; ;thos nas kyang yul drang srong smra bar song nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-2: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-3: des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las chos thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-4: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-5: de nas des tshe gcig tu sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-7: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-8: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-9: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20a-11: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-1: de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-2: gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-3: des der sbyin pa dag byin zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-4: bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-5: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-7: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-9: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-12: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-14: bam po nyi shu brgyad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-15: 'od srung gtso bo zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-16: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-17: de'i tshe ri'i sul zhig na drang srong 'khor khri nyis stong yod pa zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-18: drang srong de yang bstan bcos thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa; rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-19: des bram ze khri nyis stong po de dag bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:20b-20: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-0: de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis @21a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-1: mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du las kyi rnam par smin pa zhig lung bstan nas mtsho de nyid kyi nang nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-2: nam mkha' las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-3: drang srong de 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das mtsho de nyid kyi nang nas nam mkha' la gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-4: mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas thams cad bor te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-9: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-10: des na drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams kyis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-11: drang srong gtso bo des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21a-12: thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas ci yang ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-0: de nas drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams stan @21b las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-1: btsun pa; bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-2: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-3: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong khri nyis stong po de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de rnams la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-5: de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-7: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-8: drang srong gtso bo de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-9: rab tu byung yang ci yang ma thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-10: de nas des de thos nas 'bad pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-11: des ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs nas rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-12: de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-14: sems can stong phrag du ma dag la chos ston la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:21b-17: bdag gi grogs po 'di dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-0: de thos nas ci bya gtol med @22a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-1: par gyur te khyad par ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-3: sems pa btang la re zhig bsgrim par bya'o snyam nas des thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-5: nye bar brtags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-6: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-7: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-8: tsandan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-9: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-10: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-11: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur bsti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-12: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-13: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-15: drang srong de thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs nas ci yang ma thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-16: slad kyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22a-18: nye bar brtags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @22b pa; da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-1: 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-3: brtags pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-4: mngon par shes pa lnga ji ltar bskyed pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod cig na bram ze 'od srung gtso bo zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-7: phyi zhig na de rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag gi don la ri'i sul zhig tu song ba las des der drang srong khri nyis stong mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de dag la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-9: khyim gyi chos la gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-11: khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung ba las na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-13: 'khor ba las grol ba yin gor ma chag gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-14: ma la bdag kyang 'di dag kho na'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-15: snyam nas des thams cad bor te drang srong de dag gi thad du rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-16: de der song nas bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-17: de nas phyi zhig na drang srong gtso bo de shi nas bram ze'i khye'u khri nyis stong po de rnams drang srong de shi ba'i phyir shin tu mya ngan byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-18: de nas 'od srung gtso bo des de dag la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-20: ha cang mya ngan ma byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:22b-22: sme sngags 'don par ma byed cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-2: zhes byas nas des bram ze'i khye'u khri nyis stong po de dag thams cad bsdus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-3: de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung yang phog nas de dag thams cad kyis bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-4: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-5: de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung gtso bos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-6: bdag gis slob ma 'di rnams kyis ni; bdag gi yid la byed pas chos 'di lta bu rtogs par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-8: thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas ci yang ma thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-9: bdag la thos pa 'di ci dgos snyam nas des kyang sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-11: nye bar brtags pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-12: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-15: de'i tshe 'od srung gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-16: drang srong 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-17: de'i tshe yang 'di thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas ci yang ma thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-18: phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-20: nye bar brtags pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-21: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-22: da ltar yang 'di thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas sngar ci yang ma thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23a-23: phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-0: nye bar brtags pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum @23b du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-1: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-3: drang srong 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-4: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-7: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-10: 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-16: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha los gyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:23b-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-0: gang gi tshe de sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod @24a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-1: rten de la bkur sti chen po byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-2: mchod rten gyi dus ston gyi lugs btod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-3: de nas phyi zhig na mchod rten de'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa na; rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi khams su gtogs pa ri khrod kyi rgyal po 'khor khri nyis stong dang ldan pa zhig gis kyang mchod pa'i las la brtson par byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-5: ston pa 'di dang 'dra ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-6: de nas zham ring ba rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa; lha gcig gis smon lam ci btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-7: de nas rgyal pos kyang de dag la rgyas par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-8: de nas zham ring ba rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-9: bdag cag gis kyang lha gcig la brten te ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-10: mi mnyes par byed pa ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24a-11: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-0: de'i tshe ri khrod kyi rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa @24b de ni; drang srong 'di kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-1: de'i tshe de'i 'khor khri nyis stong por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-2: bram ze khri nyis stong po 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-3: der mchod rten de la bkur bsti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-4: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-5: drang srong khri nyis stong po 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la brten nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-6: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-7: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-8: der 'di dag thams cad kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-9: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-10: glang chen gnas zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-11: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:24b-12: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i glang po che'i bla glang chen snying po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-0: @25a *// rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-1: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-2: de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-3: bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-4: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-5: khye'u 'di rgyu skar nag pa la skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-6: gcig tu na glang po che'i bla glang chen snying po'i bu yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-7: khye'u 'di'i ming nag pa glang chen gnas zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-9: de nas khye'u nag pa glang chen gnas 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-13: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-14: rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis bzo'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-15: las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-16: glang po che bzhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25a-22: g-yul las thar bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-1: rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-2: mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-12: gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-13: tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-14: de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi nas de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos glang po che'i blar bskos te pha'i las thabs de nyid byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-15: de nas des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-16: de nas phyi zhig na des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-17: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-18: des sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-19: de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum bslabs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-20: de nas phyi zhig na des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-21: bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:25b-24: bdag gis yid la byed pa la 'bad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-0: snyam du bsam ste des yid la byed pa bzung nas @26a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-1: srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar nyams su blangs te gnas pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bsam gtan gyi bar du bskyed nas des slob ma lnga brgya bsdus te 'khor dang ldan par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-2: de nas phyi zhig na de 'khor dang bcas pa ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-3: de mthar gyis spyod yul du rgyu ba las slar log nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la de rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-6: nag pa glang chen gnas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-8: de yang bu ma mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-10: de ci bdog pa thams cad lha gcig mnga' lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-12: de nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-13: nga ni shi ba'i nor dbang du zad kyi; gson po'i ni mi dbang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-14: rigs kyi bu de yang da dung gson por 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-15: drang srong rnams ni phyir yang 'bab cing khyim na gnas par 'gyur yang srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-16: zhes byas nas rgyal pos de'i khyim nas ci yang ma bzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-17: de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung mas nag pa glang chen gnas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab tu lhags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-18: zhes thos so; ;thos nas kyang des 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te khyim du zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-19: de nas de'i chung mas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26a-20: ci 'di bya ba byas pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-0: 'on te so so'i skye @26b bo yin zhig gu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-1: gal te so so'i skye bo yin na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-2: 'di drang ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas des de zan za ba'i tshe khang thog nas zangs gzhong zhig mdun du bor nas de de'i sgras skrag par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-3: gcig tu na zan za ba'i tshe des zangs gzhong de la gris brud pa ltar yang byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-4: des de mthong nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-6: dgra bcom pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-8: so so'i skye bo yin pas bdag gis 'di drang nus so snyam nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-9: jo bo mi bzhugs pas bdag gi longs spyod 'di dag dmas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-10: de bas na jo bo sang yang 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang khyim 'dir bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-11: de nas nag ba glang chen gnas kyis chung ma la cang mi zer bar khas blangs nas des phyi nyin de 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang zan byin nas yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-12: phyi de nyin par 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang zan la bos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-13: de bzhin du mthar gyis bud med des 'khor je nyung je nyung du phri nas tha ma'i nyin par gcig pu zan la bos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-14: de des zan byin nas de drang ba'i phyir phongs pa'i tshog smra zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-15: jo bo mi bzhugs pas 'di ltar bran rnams kyis kyang brnyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-17: des snga nas khol po khye'u zhig la bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-18: gang gi tshe nga chos nyan cing 'dug pa de'i tshe khyod kyis nga lan gsum gyi bar du dgug pa thong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:26b-19: nga'i gan du shog cig ces springs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-0: @27a *// de nas khyod kyi thad du 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-1: de'i 'og tu khyod kyis nga'i co to nas zungs la jo bo'i mdun du rdeg cig ces byas te bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-2: de nas khol ba khye'u des kyang de kho na bzhin du byas nas bud med des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-5: khyod nyid kyi mdun du yang bdag 'di kho na lta zhing mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-7: de nas thos ma thag tu nag pa glang chen gnas khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa chen po skyes nas de khros pas chung mas snga nas mal du ral gri bzhag pa de blangs nas shubs las phyung ste khye'u de'i steng du brgyugs nas chung mas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-9: re zhig gzu lums ma mdzad par bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-10: de'i 'og tu 'di bcos pas slebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-11: de nas nag pa glang chen gnas kyis chung ma de nyid kyi mdun du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-12: chos gos tshon can rnams bor nas khyim pa'i gos rnams bgos te 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-13: de nas chung ma na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-15: bdag gis jo bo drang pa'i thabs bgyi ba'i slad du de ltar bgyis par bas kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-16: jo bos 'di la 'khon du mi gzung bar gsol; jo bo'i khyim gyi 'byor ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-18: da slan chad jo bo 'dod pa rnams kyang spyod cing bzhugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27a-19: sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin par mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-0: bsod nams @27b dag kyang mdzod cig ces zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-1: de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos nag pa glang po chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te nyams par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-2: zhes thos nas rgyal pos de la dgug pa btang nas de la sngon gyi las thabs byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-3: de nas dge slong mang po dag snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la dong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-4: dge slong mang po dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te nyams par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-6: thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms blangs nas zan zos te zas phyis len pa spangs nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste rkang pa bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-7: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:27b-9: 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 'tshal te lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la mchis pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-0: bdag cag dge slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba rnams kyis nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul @28a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-5: rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring du khyim du mi gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-7: yang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-9: de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis nag pa glang chen gnas gdul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-10: mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas nag pa glang chen gnas kyi khyim gang na 'dug pa der gshegs te byon nas khyim gyi sgon gzhes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-11: de drang ba'i phyir 'od zer bkye nas des de'i khyim thams cad gser zhun ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur to; ;de nas nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-13: bcom ldan 'das kho na'i yin gor ma chag na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-14: bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs te bdag la dgongs shig gu snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-15: de'i skabs su 'phrin pa 'ongs nas nag pa glang chen gnas la sbran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28a-16: bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-0: @28b de nas gus par bsgrims pas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci stsal lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-3: khyod khyim na gnas pa thong la tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-4: yang nga'i thad du rab tu byung zhig ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-6: tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bur gyur pa su'i ngag kyang ma bcag pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yang sus kyang gcog nus pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal ba bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-10: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od ma'i tshal du khrid nas rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-14: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-15: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:28b-17: nag pa glang chen gnas kyis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-1: smin pas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-4: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-6: btsun pa; 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-9: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig na khyim bdag nag pa zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-11: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-12: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa las; phyi zhig na de dpyid ka'i dus na shing yal ga 'khrigs shing me tog rgyas pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-13: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-14: bas mtha'i gnas mal na gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-15: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-16: rang sangs rgyas shig ri khrod der bsod snyoms la 'gro 'dod nas des skyed mos tshal de na rol mo'i sgra grag pa thos nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29a-17: bdag dgang dka' ba'i lto 'di'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-0: ri khrod du 'gro @29b ci dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-1: skyed mos tshal 'di'i nang du song dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-2: 'di nas bdag gi bsod snyoms 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-3: rang sangs rgyas de skyed mos tshal der song nas khyim bdag des de lus mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-4: sems mdzes pa de de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-5: mthong nas kyang khyim bdag de rang sangs rgyas de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-6: shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-7: de dga' bar gyur nas bshos gsol te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-10: bdag gis khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-11: rang sangs rgyas des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-12: nags khrod ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-13: zhes smras nas rang sangs rgyas de dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-14: de nas khyim bdag de dus dus su nags khrod der bshos 'bul zhing bsnyen bkur yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-15: de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de de blta ba'i phyir song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-16: rang sangs rgyas de shing zhig gi drung du gnas bcas te klu'i rgyal po'i lus bskyil te gnyid log pa bzhin skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-17: de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de rab tu dben par gnas pa mthong nas de yang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-18: de nas de rang sangs rgyas de'i thad du song nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-20: bdag rab tu phyung zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-21: bdag kyang khyod kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:29b-22: rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-1: byed de; drang srong rnams rab tu 'byin par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-2: drang srong rnams kyi nang du song la rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-3: de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des khyim gyi 'khor btang nas sbyin ba dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas de der rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-4: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-5: de rab tu byung nas rang sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-6: de nas drang srong de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-7: bdag song la yon gnas kyi mchog dge ba'i bshes gnyen de la bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-8: 'on tang de las bdag gis gong ma'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-9: de nags khrod der song ba las des der rang sangs rgyas de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-11: rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig nags khrod der mthong nas des de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-14: kha dog 'di lta bu zhig nags khrod 'di na 'dug 'dug pa gar song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-16: yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-17: des smras pa de gang du mya ngan las 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-18: de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i sku gdung de dag bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30a-19: de nas des sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-0: me @30b tog rnams kyis bkur sti byas te smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-1: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-2: bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-3: 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-4: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-5: yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog cig ces smon lam btab nas sa phyogs de nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-6: de nas phyi zhig na de shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-7: de shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-10: de'i tshe khyim bdag nag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-11: nag pa glang cheng nas 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-12: des rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te; rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas kyang ches khyad du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te mi mnyes pa ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:30b-13: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-1: chen gnas mchis brang gis thabs bgyis te 'dod pa spyod du stsal pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-3: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-4: 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di chung ma des thabs byas nas ji ltar 'dod pa spyod du bcug pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-6: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-7: de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi mdun na 'don bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-8: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas bu mtshe ma gnyis byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-9: de gnyis kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas ste khye'u 'di gnyis ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de khye'u 'di gnyis mes byin gyi bu yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31a-15: de nas khye'u me'i bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-0: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang spyod pa dang aom zhes bya ba dang bho zhes bya ba dang gtsang sbra dang cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang ril ba thogs pa dang nges brjod kyi rig byed dang @31b mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang snyan tshig gi rig byed dang srid srung gi rig byed dang mchod sbyin bya ba dang mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang sbyin pa dang blang ba dang kha ton bya ba dang kha ton slob tu gzhug ba'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-1: de gnyis mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-2: phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis phas chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid 'dzin pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-3: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-4: pha med par gyur pa'i 'og tu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-5: bdag cag gnyis pa'i las thabs su bsko bar 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-6: bdag cag gnyis khyim na gnas pa gtang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-9: 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa'i mis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-10: rgyal srid kyi phyir gsod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-12: brdeg pa'i las byed pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-13: nags khung du shing shun gyi gos gyon zhing shing tog za la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-14: gcan gzan dag dang lhan cig gnas kyang bla'i /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-15: zhes zer nas pha ma la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-17: bdag cag gnyis dka' thub kyi nags tshal du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-19: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-21: gang gi phyir drang srong rnams dka' thub spyod pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-22: khyod gnyis kyi lag na 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:31b-23: nged shi ba'i 'og tu khyed gnyis cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid 'dzin par 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-1: smras pa; bdag cag gnyis 'jigs pa yang de kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-2: de'i phyir nags khung du gnas bca' bar 'dod pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-4: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-5: de ltar pha ma gnyis kyis de gnyis la lan mang du bkag kyang dgag ma nus nas de gnyis la pha mas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-7: gal te khyad par cung zad thob par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-8: nged gnyis la bltar shog cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-9: de nas de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-10: khyed gnyis ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-11: zhes byas nas khye'u de gnyis kyis pha ma la phyi phyag byas te nags khung du gnas bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-12: de gnyis der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-13: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-14: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-15: bdag cag gnyis kyis pha ma la dam bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-16: gal te khyad par cung zad thob par gyur na; khyed gnyis la bltar 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-19: zhes zer nas steng gi nam mkha' las dong ste pha ma gnyis kyi thad du phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-20: de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-21: dga' bar gyur nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-22: khyed gnyis kyang bsod snyoms 'dod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32a-23: nged gnyis kyang bsod nams 'dod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-0: 'dir bdag @32b cag gi skyed mos tshal du gnas par gyis shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-1: bdag cag gnyis kyis khyed gnyis kyi zan sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-4: khyed gnyis ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-5: zhes byas nas skyed mos tshal de nyid du yal ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-6: lo ma'i spyil po bcas nas 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-7: de nas de gnyis w'a ra n'a si'i phyogs kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-10: mchod pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-11: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis mdun na 'don mes byin gyi bu gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-12: zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-13: g-yar drangs nas zan byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-14: zan byin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-15: dus dus su khyed gnyis nga la bltar shog ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-16: de nas de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-18: ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-19: zhes byas nas de gnyis song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-20: de nas dus dus su de gnyis steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-21: rgyal po tshangs pas byin la bltar 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-22: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang de gnyis 'ongs nas nam mkha' de nyid las pang du blangs te stan la bzhag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:32b-23: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-1: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi 'bangs ri khrod pa rnams log nas dpung gi tshogs go bskon te chas nas des bu mo la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-3: drang srong de gnyis nam 'ongs dang nga ji ltar bkur sti byed pa de kho na bzhin du khyod kyis kun gyis shig ces byas nas rgyal po de song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-4: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang du drang srong me'i bu'i don zhig yod pa'i phyir der drang srong me lce btang ste de steng gi nam mkha' las rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas bu mo des drang srong nam mkha' la 'dug pa bang du blangs te 'khyud nas stan la bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-6: reg na gdug pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-7: bu mo des reg ma thag tu drang srong me lce rdzu 'phrul de las nyams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-8: bu mo de yang drang srong de gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mthong nas chags par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-9: de de dang gnas dben pa zhig tu zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig tu nyal bo byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-10: de nas de btsun mo'i 'khor gyis tshor te de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-11: gal te bdag cag gis drang srong 'di la tshig 'ga' byas na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-12: drang srong 'di rdzu 'phrul che bas dmod pa 'dor srid do snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-13: de dag 'jigs skrag nas cung zad kyang ma smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-14: drang srong de yang rgyal po'i pho brang de nyid du 'dug cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33a-15: rkang pas 'gror ngo tsha ste ma phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-0: @33b de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis ri khrod pa phab nas phyir log ste rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-1: zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de de la bltar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-3: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-4: bu mos kyang drang srong de'i skom khyer te 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-5: de nas de mthong ma thag tu drang srong de shin tu chags par gyur to; ;drang srong de myos pa tsam du chags par gyur nas rgyal po de'i spyan sngar lag pa brkyangs nas lag pas gzung zhes byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-6: rgyal pos de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu ral gri rnon po thogs te drang srong de gsad par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-7: bu mos mthong nas drang srong de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-10: khyod gsang nan dgos pa'i phyir 'khrul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-11: khyod [?] gyis 'dir phyag brkyang lags sam zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-12: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de bzhin du yid ches par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-13: drang srong 'di 'khrul to snyam du bsam nas skyen par skom phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-14: de nas de la zan byin nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun na 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-15: de nas drang srong me'i bu dka' thub kyi nags tshal na 'dug pas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:33b-16: ci drang srong de de tsam gyi bar du ma 'ongs na ci snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-0: des bltas na 'dod pa spyod par gyur la skabs su chud cing 'dug par mthong nas 'di deng du srog yal bar 'gyur srid do snyam nas steng @34a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-1: gi bar snang las rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-2: rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang drang srong de nam mkha' de nyid las pang du blangs nas stan la bzhag ste chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-3: de nas des rgyal po de la chos tha gi tsam bshad nas nu bo khrid de steng gi nam mkha' las dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-4: de nas des de la yid la byed pa'i man ngag phog nas des phyir yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-5: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-6: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-7: bu mo 'dis ma legs pa 'di lta bu byas pa de gal te bdag cag gis ma gsol na; bdag cag la yang 'di'i phyir gyod 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhe sdang chen po'i dbang du gyur nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te drang srong de'i gnas su song nas drang srong me lces rgyal po tshangs pas byin dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te 'ongs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-9: mthong nas kyang sems pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34a-10: 'di bsam pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'dir 'ongs snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-0: des bltas na bdag @34b gsad par 'dod do snyam du rig nas de nyid dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-1: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis drang srong me lce steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de'i khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa de med par gyur te the tshom skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-2: ci 'di ngas ji skad thos pa de bzhin du gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-3: 'on te ma gyur snyam nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-4: bram ze me lce bdag gis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-5: 'dod pa spyod ces sngar thos na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-6: tshig de bden pa yin nam ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-7: 'on te ci lags mi spyod dam //
