K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-8: rgyal po chen po de bden te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-9: khyod kyi gzhan las thos pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-10: bdag ni lam ngan zhugs gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-11: chags pa'i gnas su myos par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-12: de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin the tshom skyes te drang srong me'i bu'i thad du song nas des drang srong de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-15: 'di'i slad du bdag gis ji skad thos pa de kho na bzhin lags sam; drang srong gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-17: de kho na bzhin du bden mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-21: 'o na ji ltar 'dod pa yang longs spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:34b-22: rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-0: drang srong 'di gang gi tshe 'dod pa spyod par gyur pa de'i tshe na rdzu 'phrul las nyams @35a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-1: so; ;'di gnas de nas bdag gis khrid de lung yang phog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-2: yid la byed pa'i thabs kyang bstan nas 'dis kyang phyir yang rdzu 'phrul bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-3: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de de la dga' bar gyur nas des drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-6: de'i tshe drang srong me'i bur gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-7: byang chub kyi spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-9: de'i tshe de'i nu bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-10: nag pa glang chen gnas 'di kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-11: de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor gyur pa yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-12: chung ma 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-13: de'i tshe yang des tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las nyams par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-14: te 'dod pa spyod pa la gnas par byas pa las de ngas de nas drangs te phyir yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-15: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-16: da ltar yang 'dis 'di tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las nyams par byas nas 'dod pa la gnas par byas pa las de ngas de nas drangs te g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35a-17: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-0: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas des der tshe gcig tu tshangs @35b par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-1: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-2: las pa rgya tham pa bam po nyi shu dgu pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-3: sa ra na zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-4: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-5: de'i tshe yul gyen du rgyal zhes bya ba na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-6: rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-7: yul dpa' rab ces bya ba na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-8: rgyal po 'char ka zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-9: de gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pas dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-10: de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bus nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de'i tshe des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-12: bdag gi sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba mang po sel ba yin; bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma sgrub pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-13: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sel ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-14: dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sgrub pa yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-15: dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten te rus pa'i ri ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-17: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-19: bcom ldan 'das de'i bka' drin bdag gis ji ltar bsam par bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-20: de nas yang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:35b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-0: sems can la phan pa'i phyir @36a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-2: ma la bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-3: de nas de sems pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-4: bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-5: des bltas na yul dpa' rab ces bya ba na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams lhag par bdag gis gdul bar bya ba yin par mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-7: bdag ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-10: khyod song la bdag brgal nas gzhan sgrol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-11: bdag grol nas gzhan grol bar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-12: bdag dbugs phyin nas gzhan dbugs phyung shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-13: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36a-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-0: de nas de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las yul gyen du rgyal du phyin @36b te de der phyin nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-1: yul dpa' rab tu song nas rgyal po 'char dka' dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-2: skye bo phal po che yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-3: de nas phyi zhig na yul dpa' rab kyi rgyal po 'char ka'i btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-4: bcu lon pa dang bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-5: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming sa ran zhes bya bar btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-6: de nas khye'u sa ra na 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-10: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skyeng drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-11: de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-12: las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-13: glang po che zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-19: g-yul las thar par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-23: rdo rje rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:36b-24: mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-8: gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-9: tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-10: de nas phyi zhig na gzhon nus ra na tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bu la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-11: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-12: de nas des bltas na pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-16: bdag la rgyal srid mi dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la chu bo rnams las brgal bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-18: sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-21: snyam nas yab yum la gsol te tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bu'i thad du rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bus bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37a-23: yul 'di nas bkar dgos so snyam nas de khrid de yul gyen du rgyal du song nas de na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-0: de nas @37b phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs gyon te lhung bzed thogs nas grong khyer gyen du rgyal du bsod snyoms la song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-1: de yang spyod yul gyi rgyus mi shes la; lam po che dang srang gi rgyus la mi mkhas pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-2: de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing song song ba las rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi pho brang gi chab sgor byin nas chab sgo ba rnams med pa'i skabs su de rgyal po'i pho brang gi nang du song nas de rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis mthong na gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te lus kyi sha rgyas par 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-3: de nas de mthong ma thag tu de dag de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-4: shin tu dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-7: 'di ltar gzugs mdzes shing na so gzhon la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-8: tshangs par spyod pa la yang gnas so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-9: de nas de dag dga' bar gyur pas de'i stan bshams te 'dug tu bcug nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na bskor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir gung la bzhag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-10: de nas de de na 'dug pa'i skabs su rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-11: btsun mo rnams kyi lugs kyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:37b-12: gang gi tshe rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor du 'ong ba de'i tshe langs te bsur 'gro ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-0: @38a *// de rnams chos nyan pa la 'dun ches nas ldang ba dang bsu ba yang ma byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-1: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-2: ma la bdag btsun mo rnams kyis ma bsus pa 'di ci las gyur snyam nas rgyal pos de 'phrigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-3: de khros bzhin du btsun mo'i 'khor du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-4: de der song ste bltas na tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na btsun mo rnams kyis bskor ba mthong nas rgyal po de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-6: dge slong gis nga'i chung ma mthong gis med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-10: 'on te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yin brtag par bya'o snyam ste; de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-11: ci khyod dgra bcom pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-16: ci khyod phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-18: rgyun du zhugs pa thob pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-19: 'du shes med 'du shes min skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-20: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-21: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38a-22: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched thob pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-0: bsam @38b gtan dang po thob pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-4: de nas rgyal pos bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-5: dge slong 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-6: 'di mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis ma bslabs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-7: ngas 'di bslab par bya'o snyam nas zham ring pa rnams bos te de lcag gis zhen par bzhus te btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-8: de nas de lcag gis bzhus pas pags pa ral nas khros te bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-9: bdag mnyes par dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po 'dis brdegs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-10: bdag pha'i yul du song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-11: pha'i yul du 'dug ste dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te song la dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po 'di rdul bton te gtang ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-12: tshe dang ldan pa k'a tya ya na'i bu ga la 'dug pa der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a tya ya na'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-14: bdag ma nongs par dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po des brdegs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-15: bdag pha'i yul du mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-16: der mchis nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te mchis la dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po de rdul ba ton te gtang gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-17: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-20: khro ba'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:38b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-3: grags pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-7: sdug bsngal thams cad bzod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-8: zhes ma gsungs sam zhes byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-9: gnas brtan des de la lan mang du bkag kyang dgag ma nus nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a y'a na'i bus de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-17: dred mo rnams kyis 'jigs pa yod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-18: do nub kyi tshe la 'dir 'dug la nang par song zhig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-20: mkhan pos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-21: zhes byas nas de gnas brtan de dang gnas khang gcig tu nyal te; tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bus de bzlog pa'i phyir de byin gyis brlabs te ci nas de nyal ba'i rmi lam du des bslab pa phul te pha'i yul du song nas phas de rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-22: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi byin nas 'di skad ces bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-23: khyod kyis thog ma kho nar las su bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39a-24: dgra tshar gcad par gyis shig ces byas nas de thos ma thag tu des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas rgyal po rab snang gi yul du dmag drangs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-0: rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis @39b de g-yul du pham par byas te thub par gyur nas rgyab kyis phyogs par byas te gson por bzung nas gsod du btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-1: de gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis khrid de gsad pa'i sar phyin du nye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-2: des bltas na rmi lam nyid na tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bu grong khyer gyen du rgyal na bsod snyoms byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas des khus btab ste mkhan po; ;bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-3: bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-4: srog phangs ba sbyin par mdzad du gsol zhes zer zhing 'dug pa rmi lam du mthong bar byin gyis brlabs so; ;de nas de des skrag nas sad kyang rmi lam la yang dag pa tsam du 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdol nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bus de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-6: khyod kyis rmi lam mthong bar zad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu sa ra na dga' bar gyur nas sems pa la zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-9: sa ra na zhes bya ba de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-12: sems can gcig la yang 'tshe ba ma byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-13: da bdag khro ba'i dbang du song ste rmi lam du yang skye bo mang po de snyed bsad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:39b-14: don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu bdag gis gtang ngo snyam mo; ;de nas gnas brtan des de'i yid skyo bar rig nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-0: des na sa ra nas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs @40a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-1: te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-2: de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bdag gis dge slong lcag gis bzhus pa gang yin pa de rgyal po 'char ka'i bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-3: zhes thos nas de'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-4: de nyid la brten nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bu zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-5: de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na'i bus bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-6: rnyed pa dang bkur sti skyes kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-7: gcad dgos so snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na ji ltar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-9: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-11: sa ra nas las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-12: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-14: las de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis lcag gis bzhus la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40a-15: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-0: bcom ldan @40b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-2: 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-4: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-5: phyi zhig na de btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-6: rgyal po gnyid kyis log go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-9: 'bras bu la sred pas de'i btsun mo rnams skyed mos tshal der phan tshun du rgyu ba la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe rang sangs rgyas rnams /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-11: 'jig rten du 'byung ste rang sangs rgyas shig skyed mos tshal der mtshan mo dgongs mal btab nas lus mdzes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-12: sems mdzes pa de bud med de dag gis mthong nas mthong ma thag tu de la dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-13: dga' ba skyes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-14: de nas rgyal po de sad de btsun mo'i 'khor mi snang bas khros te ral gri rnon po thogs nas rjes gar byung ba'i thogs thag tu so ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-15: rgyal po des rang sangs rgyas de btsun mo'i 'khor la chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-16: mthong nas kyang dge slong gis nga'i chung ma mthong ngo snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:40b-17: de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-2: rang sangs rgyas de lcag gis zhen par bzhus te gtang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-3: de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-5: smras shing nyams par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-6: 'di gtan du 'khyams na mi rung gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-7: ra mda' bya dgos so snyam du bsam nas nam mkha' la 'phags te 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-10: glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-11: so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-12: rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-13: de mthong ma thag tu de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-14: dga' bar gyur nas sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-15: skal pa chen po dang ldan pa mar spyon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-16: bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drongs shig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-17: de nas rang sangs rgyas de de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yo byad thams cad bstabs te skyed mos tshal de nyid du yal ga dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-18: lo ma'i spyil po phub nas yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-19: de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41a-20: bdag la lus khol ba pa 'dis ci dgos kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-0: bdag zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i @41b khams su 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas 'bar ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-3: glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-4: de nas rgyal po des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te mchod rten la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-5: kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag la 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las 'di bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-6: bdag gis phyir yang bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-7: bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-8: 'di bas kyang chos khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-9: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-10: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-14: de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:41b-15: sa ra na 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-0: des rang sangs rgyas la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus la lcag gis bzhus pas lcag 'og tu shi @42a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-1: nas 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa da lta bu mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-2: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-3: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas 'dis dar tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad de dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-4: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-5: ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-6: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-7: de'i tshe yul bi de ha'i ljongs na ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-8: ri dvags kyi pags pa gyon zhing rva thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-9: ri dvags rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsa za zhing chu 'thung ba lnga brgya tsam zhig 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-11: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-12: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-14: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-15: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42a-16: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-0: rnam par thar pa brgyad la @42b bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-1: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-2: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-3: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-4: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-5: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-16: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-24: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-26: nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-28: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-32: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:42b-34: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-0: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzags pa 'jug go @43a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-1: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-2: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-3: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-4: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-5: ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can de rnams kyis ri dvags de dag rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro ba mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-6: mthong nas de rnams kyang ri dvags de dag dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-7: de nas de dag der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i ri dvags de dag mi snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-8: de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis de rnams mthong nas rnam par smod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-9: de ltar smad nas de rnams rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal logs su chas so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mdun du bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-10: de nas ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43a-11: mthong nas kyang de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-0: dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs @43b ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir sbyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-5: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dag dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te des na ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-6: de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-8: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-9: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-10: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyan par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-12: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-14: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:43b-15: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-1: rnams kyis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-2: las de'i rnam par smin pas ri dvags kyi cha lugs su mchis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-3: ri dvags rnams dang lhan cig tu rtsva za zhing chu 'thung bar gyur nas 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-7: 'di rnams nyid kyis las byas shing bsags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-9: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-12: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-13: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44a-15: de dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-0: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na dka' thub kyi gnas shig na bram ze 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des bcom ldan @44b 'das 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-1: mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-2: khyed 'od srung gi dge slong ri dvags bzhin du rgyu ba 'di dag la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-5: gang dga' bar rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-7: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas de bram ze'i khye'u de dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-8: de dag der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob nas de dag gis 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-9: 'di ltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-11: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:44b-12: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-1: dge slong lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-2: ri dvags kyi brtul zhugs can 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-3: de rnams kyis der dge slong rnams la tshig rtsub po smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-6: zhes byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-7: tshe rabs lnga brgyar ri dvags su skyes nas da ltar srid pa tha ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-8: gnas tha mar gyur pa'i bar du yang ri dvags kyi cha lugs 'dzin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-9: de rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-11: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-12: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-13: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45a-16: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-0: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu @45b byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-1: zla ba zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-2: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-3: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze che zhing mtho ba zla ba bde ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-4: des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-5: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-6: gzhung gis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam zer yang ci ma rung snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-7: de nas des khyim thab la bsnyad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-9: bdag la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-10: bdag gzhung gis rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam zer yang ci ma rung snyam bgyid do; ;zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-11: bram ze de yang ltas la mkhas pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-13: 'di lta na 'dug pa'i sems can de'i mthu yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-14: des 'di'i yid la 'dod pa de lta bu skyes so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-17: bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-18: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-19: bu mo 'di zla ba bde ba'i bu mo yin bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-20: bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba zhes gdags so zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:45b-21: de nas bu mo zla ba 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-2: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur nas gang gi tshe de chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe khyim de nyid du yi ge bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-3: de ring po ma lon par yi ge'i mthar phyin nas des khyim de nyid du pha ma las bstan bcos thams cad lobs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-4: gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad nas des tshig tu bya ba thos so tsog lobs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-5: de nas phyi zhig na des mnyan du yod pa 'di nyid na dge sbyong go'u ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-6: thams cad gzigs pa yin par bdag nyid khas 'che ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-7: zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu bu mo de ya mtshan du gyur te bdag song la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de ci 'dra ba blta bar bya'o snyam ste pha ma gnyis la gsol nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste bu mo des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-8: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-9: me lce mar gyis btab ba lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-10: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46a-11: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-0: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @46b mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-1: mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-3: lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-4: de de ltar dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-9: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-10: des na bu mo zla bas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:46b-12: bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-0: bsnyen bar rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos @47a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-2: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta m'i la gtad nas skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta m'is de rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-6: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-7: der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-8: dge slong ma rnams kyis las la 'du ba logs shig tu gyis shig ces gsungs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-9: skye rgu'i bdag mo go'u ta m'is so so thar pa'i mdo 'don mi nus nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-10: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la skye rgu'i bdag mo go'u ta m'is 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'du ba logs shig tu gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47a-12: dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'du ba logs shig tu gyis shig ces bka' stsal la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong @47b rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-2: dge slong ma rnams la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis so so thar pa bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-5: bdag gis gzung par 'tshal lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-7: tshig re re nas zlos shing chos gsung mi srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-9: de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo go'u ta m'i la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-11: gal te lan gcig smras pas 'dzin nus na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-14: de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-15: dge slong ma zla bas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis so so thar pa bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-17: lan gcig bka' stsal pas bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal lo; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la so so thar pa'i mdo bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:47b-18: lan gcig bka' stsal pas dge slong ma zla bas lobs nas des sde snod gsum yang lobs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-0: tshig tu bya ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad kyang thos ma thag tu lobs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan @48a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-1: to; ;de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-3: dge slong ma zla bas las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-4: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-5: 'dis bstan bcos thams cad kyang lobs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-6: gzhung gis rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad nas 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-8: 'dis thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-11: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-14: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48a-16: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-0: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med @48b pa; lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-2: de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-3: de gang las rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i mkhan mo de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-4: de nas des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-5: 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-7: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-8: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-9: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sh'akya thub pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:48b-10: sh'akya'i rgyal po des thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-2: dge slong ma zla ba 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-3: des der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de 'chi khar smon lam btab pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-5: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-8: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te ma mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-9: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas ngas 'di thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-10: mi'am ci gnyis zhes bya ba de la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-12: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-13: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-14: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-15: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49a-16: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-0: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu @49b chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-2: bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-10: smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-11: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-12: khye'u 'di mchog tu byad gzugs mdzes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-13: byad gzugs mi'am ci dang 'dra bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-14: khye'u 'di'i ming mi'am ci zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-16: de nas khye'u mi'am ci 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-20: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-21: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-30: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-33: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-35: go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-39: bya ba la gsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:49b-41: brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-0: de nas grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad du de'i @50a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-1: grags pa rgyas par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-2: mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag che ge mo'i bu byad gzugs mi'am ci dang 'dra ba zhig skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-3: zhes grags so; ;de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che ya mtshan du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-5: de nas de byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas su la yang mi ldang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-6: byad gzugs nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-7: de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-9: 'di la bcom ldan 'das bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-11: su yang nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam du byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-13: khyod kyi bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-15: de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-16: stong gi char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-17: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-19: de nas de thos ma thag tu de ya mtshan du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50a-20: bdag bas dge sbyong go'u ta ma ches gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la ches mdzes pa blta snyam nas skye bo mang pos g-yog byas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-0: khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas @50b pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-1: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-2: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-3: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-4: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras ba lta bu; blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-5: mthong nas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa de med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-6: de nas de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-7: dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-12: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-13: des na khye'u mi'am cis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-14: des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:50b-16: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-1: dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-5: bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-7: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-8: 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa gsal nas ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-9: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-11: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-12: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-15: bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-19: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-20: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas su la yang gsong por smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51a-23: de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-0: 'di'i @51b byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-1: de ltar ma byas na 'di zhi bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-2: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si'i sa phyogs zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa; rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-3: de nas bram ze des drang srong de la gsol ba btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-4: khye'u 'di byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs nas su la yang gsong por smra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-6: ldang ba yang mi bgyid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-7: khyod kyis de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-8: de nas drang srong des bram ze de la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-9: de nas bram ze de drang srong de'i thad nas song nas bu la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-11: khyod byad gzugs bdag dang mtshungs pa med do snyam du byad gzugs kyis rgyags par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-12: dka' thub kyi gnas ga ge mo zhig na drang srong zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-14: khyod kyi byad gzugs kyis brgya'i char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-15: stong gi char yang mi phod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-16: 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-18: de nas de ya mtshan du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-19: de ya mtshan du gyur nas drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-20: drang srong des khye'u de mthong nas des khye'u de bas ches byad gzugs bzang bar bdag nyid sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:51b-21: de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas drang srong de ches gzugs bzang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-3: mthong nas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-4: drang srong de la yang dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-5: dga' bar gyur nas drang srong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-6: de nas des de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-7: de nas khye'u de drang srong de nyid las rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-8: de rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-9: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-12: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-15: de'i tshe khye'ur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-16: khye'u mi'am ci 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-17: de'i tshe yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-18: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-19: da ltar yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa bsal nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-20: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-21: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52a-22: der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-0: de'i phyir da @52b ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-2: gleng gzhi yul ser skya'i gnas na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-3: der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yab dang sras mjal bar mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nyi ma gcig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-4: rgyal po zas gtsang gi der bshos gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-6: btsun mo'i 'khor du bshos gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-7: der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das btsun mo'i 'khor du bshos gsol nas slar gshegs pa de'i tshe grags 'dzin ma khang thog tu song nas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-8: de nas gang gi skabs su mi mthong bar gyur pa de'i skabs su khang thog nas mchongs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa gzhi stan shing bal gyi nang tshangs can 'dra bar bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-9: ci nas de la cung zad kyang mi gnod par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-10: de nas skabs de rnams dge slong rnams kyis thos nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-12: grags 'dzin mas bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rang gi srog btang ba la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-14: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-15: 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i phyir 'dis ji ltar rang gi srog btang bde nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:52b-17: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-0: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go @53a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-1: bskon nas ri dvags bshor du song ba las de rta kha ma thub nas dpung gi tshogs kyang logs shig tu lus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-2: rgyal po yang logs shig tu song ste; de dpung dang bral nas lus ngal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-4: lus zhig par gyur te nags khrod cig tu zhugs te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-5: nags khrod de na mi 'am ci zhig mi 'am ci mo dang lhan cig tu pi wang thogs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-6: de nas rgyal po des de mthong nas mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de mi 'am ci mo de la shin tu chags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-7: de 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas mi 'am ci de dug mdas gnad du bsnun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-8: de phyogs de nyid du shi'a //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-9: de nas rgyal po des mi 'am ci de bsad pa'i 'og tu mi 'am ci mo'i thad du song ste smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-11: bdag cag gnyis dga' mgur spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-13: khyim bdag shi ba'i ro mdun na 'dug bzhin du bdag khyod dang ji ltar dga' mgur spyad par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53a-14: re zhig 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o; ;zhes smras nas des shing rnams bsdus te spungs pa'i steng du mi 'am ci'i rus bu de bzhag nas me btang ste phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-0: de nas gang gi tshe rus bu @53b de bsregs pa'i shing de dag la me 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe mi 'am ci mo de nyid me'i nang du mchongs nas de der shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-1: de nas rgyal po de re thag chad nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa; bdag gis don gzhan bsam bsam nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-2: log par gzhan du gyur gyis med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-3: mi 'am ci mo spyad snyam nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-4: bdag gis srog chags gnyis bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-7: de'i tshe mi 'am cir gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-10: de'i tshe mi 'am ci mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-11: grags 'dzin ma 'di kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-12: de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-13: da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-15: sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-16: las brgya tham pa kham po sum cu pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-18: gang po mchod sbyin le lo can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-19: mgon med dang ni nyam chung ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-20: padma gnyis dang lta ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-21: rin chen nor dang stobs 'phrog pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-22: gang po dang ni don gzigs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-23: stobs brtson rtsal dang mya ngan med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-24: mthun mdzad dang ni padma yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-25: bla ma gnyis dang legs mthong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-26: rin chen gtsug tor chu rlabs dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-27: rnam par rgyal ba tha ma'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:53b-29: sngom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-2: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-3: de'i tshe lho phyogs kyi ri'i ljongs na ri brags kyi grong zhig na bram ze che zhing ma tho ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-4: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-5: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-6: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-9: sems can la gnyes gshin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-10: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba gang po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-13: rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-14: slong ba rnams la gtong zhing sdud par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-15: dus dus su mchod sbyin gyi gnas bcas nas mchod sbyin yang byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-16: de nas mchod sbyin gyi dus shig la bab pa'i tshe bstan bcos thams cad kyi gzhung rnams la rtog cing gang dang gang gi lta ba ci 'dra ba zhig snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-17: des gzhung de dag yid la bzhag nas sems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-19: yongs su rtogs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-20: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams nas mchod sbyin byed pa der ston pa thams cad 'dus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54a-21: bram ze des kyang ston pa thams cad kyi gzhung yid la bzhag nas sems pa la zhugs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-0: lta ba'i rnam pa de dag @54b la sems mgu bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-1: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen rnams kyis bram ze de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-2: de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la blta 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-3: de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-4: dge sbyong dang bram ze stong phrag du ma bdag gi mchod sbyin la 'ongs nas longs spyod par byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-5: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-7: kye ma de yang bdag gi mchod sbyin la 'ongs te longs spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-9: bram ze 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-10: de kho na la brten te bdag gis skye bo mang po la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir ri brags kyi grong khyer der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-11: bcom ldan 'das der bshegs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-12: ma la bdag gis ci nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:54b-13: skye bo mang po gzhan rnams kyis bdag gcig pu mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-0: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams sus kyang mi mthong ba @55a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-1: de lta bur byin gyis brlab bo snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-2: de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-3: de nas bram ze des thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-4: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-5: bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mchod pa rnams longs spyod par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-10: khyod kyis nga'i lhung bzed 'di bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-11: bca' bdag gis ma bkang gi bar du longs spyod par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-13: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-14: zhes gsol nas bram ze des mchod sbyin byed pa der bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-15: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams pa de dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed dgang bar byas nas dgang ma nus nas des nga rgyal bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-16: bdag gis lhung bzed 'di ma gang du mi gtang ngo snyam nas g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' bas dgang ba la brtson par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-0: da @55b ni; kha zas 'dis dge slong stong gi zan chog go snyam du dgongs nas lhung bzed de gang bar bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-1: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang bar mthong nas dga' bar gyur te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bltams lags kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-3: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas ci bder gsol cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-4: de nas bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid du dge slong stong gi stan sprul te chur rnams bkang nas bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-5: dge slong gzhan rnams kyang rgan rims bzhin bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-6: de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs nas 'brim mkhan rnams kyis brims so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-7: de nas bram ze des kyang de dag thams cad mthong nas mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-8: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-9: dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-10: zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-15: sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:55b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-1: kyis bram ze de la cad mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-2: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-3: dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-4: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-6: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56a-15: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-0: 'dren pa @56b med pa; ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-2: 'jig rten mkhyen pa; skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-3: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-7: 'od ma'i tshal du zhugs par gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-8: mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-9: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-10: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-11: des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-12: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-15: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-16: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:56b-20: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-4: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-5: mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-6: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-7: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-9: mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-13: kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-14: de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-15: des bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud nas gzhung gi rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-16: de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-17: byad gzugs dang thos pa bdag dang mtshungs pa yang med na lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-18: de'i pha yang sngon dus dus su mchod sbyin byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-19: bram ze de rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-21: khyod kyi pha yang dus dus su mchod sbyin byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-22: khyod kyis kyang pha'i lugs dang mthun par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-24: byad gzugs dang thos pa bdag dang mtshungs pa med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-25: ci'i phyir bdag gis 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin zhes zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57a-26: de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de dag de la mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-0: de dag gis phyin chad de dang mi 'drul bar nang @57b khrims bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-1: de yang de dag la mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-2: bdag la yon gnas 'di lta bu dag ci dgos snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-3: de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-4: bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-5: snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te bram ze'i khye'u de'i khyim du sa brtol te gyen du 'phags nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-6: des khyim de thog thag tu gser zhun ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-7: de nas de mthong ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-8: dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-9: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-11: bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos de lta bu bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:57b-12: de nas bram ze'i khye'u de sbyin pa btang ba'i 'dod pa skyes nas de sbyin pa byed 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-0: bdag gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bgyid par rngo lthogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag @58a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gter bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-3: de mthong ma thag tu khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-4: dga' bar gyur nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-5: zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-12: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas mnyan du yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-13: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi gnas bcas nas dril bsgrags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-14: bdag ya mtshan can thams cad la mchod sbyin bgyid kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-15: su mchod ston dang yon 'dod pa de dag bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su shog la longs spyad par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-16: de nas bram ze rnams na re /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-17: bram ze la sdang ba la bdag cag longs spyod par mi byed ces zer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-18: de nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58a-19: gal te longs spyod par mi byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-0: bdag gis khyed kyi phyir yon dpag pa gang yin @58b pa de dag thams cad bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa la phul la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-1: de kho na'i bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-2: de nas bram ze rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-4: ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-5: des de kho na ltar byed srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-6: de lta na bdag cag yon gyis pham par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-7: snyam nas de dag gis de'i nang khrims bshig nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas su song ste longs spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-8: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des zla ba gsum gyi bar du ya mtshan can rnams kyi bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po sbyar nas thams cad la yon mang po phul te tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-9: dge slong gzhan rnams la yang re re la ras zung re phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi mdog lta bu'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-11: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:58b-13: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-9: bram ze'i khye'u; khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-11: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-14: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-15: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-17: zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-18: le lo can zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-19: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-20: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-21: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59a-22: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-0: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' @59b mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-1: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-3: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-4: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-8: mar gyi snying khus skyed bsrings nas mtsho'i nang gi padma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-10: mchog tu le lo che ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-11: khri la nyal zhing khri las ldang du mi btub nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-13: khyod la lus kyi nad dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-14: sems kyi gdung ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhes byas nas de le lo'i dbang gis de dag la cung zad kyang smrar mi btub nas pha ma gnyis kyis de sman pa la bstan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-16: 'di la lus kyi nad kyang ci yang med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-17: sems kyi gdung ba yang ci yang med kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-18: le lo kho nas khri las ldang du mi btub par zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-20: de nas de la pha ma gnyis kyis lan mang du bsgo ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-22: khyod 'di ltar 'dug pas bde ba thob par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-23: mi rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-24: sgrub phod pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-25: zhes lan mang du brtun kyang de bslang ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:59b-26: de nas phyi zhig na pha ma gnyis kyi sems skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-0: @60a *// yon gnas dag spyan drangs la bshos gsol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-1: de dag mthong na zhe sa bskyed de ldang yang srid do snyam nas de dag gis ston pa drug g-yar drangs te zan byin nas khye'u des de dag mthong yang ma langs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-2: des na khyim bdag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-3: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-4: bsod nams can che bar grags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-5: tshig btsan pa yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-6: khye'u 'dis de mthong na zhe sa bskyed de ldang bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas des phyi nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-7: de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshong bskul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-8: btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams @60b pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-1: de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad la dbang po zhi ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-2: thugs mchog tu dul ba dang rnam par zhi ba dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-3: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-4: mthong nas kyang de gus par bsgrims pa'i shugs kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te pha ma gnyis dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bad bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te gsang sder ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-8: bcabs par rig nas stan chas dma' ba dag blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-13: zhes bka' stsal to; ;de nas khye'u des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:60b-16: bdag gi brtson 'grus zhan pas bla ma'i khyad par thob par mi nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-0: @61a *// ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba bsgrubs la sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-2: dge 'dun la bkur bsti bya'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba'i zod khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas des rin po che'i gling du 'gro ba'i don du bsgrubs te rgya mtsho'i gru po che'i don grub nas mnyan du yod par 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-3: des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas yo byad thams cad sbyar te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das lan bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-4: dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-7: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
