K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-10: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61a-11: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-0: sangs rgyas @61b bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-6: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-8: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-11: skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-12: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-15: mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-16: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-17: de yang gso ba mang zhing g-yog 'khor mang ba zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-19: bdag gis phyug po gang zhig la brten te 'tsho ba btsal bar bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-21: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-23: sbyin pa la sred pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-25: bdag la dgos pa thams cad kyis sdud par nus so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-26: de nas de'i grib ma dang ma 'bral ba bzhin du de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:61b-27: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'phrigs nas dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-0: @62a *// bram ze; khyod nga la rag las pa ci yod; bram zes smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-3: khyod la brten nas 'tsho ba btsal bar 'dod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-4: de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de'i 'tshog chas thams cad sbyor ba la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-5: de nas phyi zhig na de yis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-6: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lugs kyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-7: nyin gcig bzhin du g-yog 'khor lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing phyag dar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-8: de nas phyi zhig na de'i bya ba zhig byung nas des bram ze de mngags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-9: deng khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyag dar gyis shig ces byas nas khyim bdag de song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-10: bram ze de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi byi dor byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62a-12: bram ze 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas cung zad tsam zhig byi dor byas pa de tsam yang mi mngon pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas de des g-yengs te nyi ma rangs par thal bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-0: @62b bdag gis mnyan du yod par mi phyin no snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du dgong mal btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-3: song la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du bram ze de'i mal chos te khyod kyang de'i 'dabs su 'dug la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-4: des khyod la ci dris pa de'i lan khyod kyis thob cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-5: gzhan yang dge slong rnams la bsgo ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-6: dge slong dag gis dge ba bcab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-7: sdig pa bshags pa'i tshul gyis gnas par gyis shig ces ngas bstan mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-8: 'on kyang bram ze 'di la snying brtse ba'i phyir sus rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu thob kyang rung ste des rdzu 'phrul de lta bu ston cig ces gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo ba rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di'i nang na bram ze 'dug pa de'i mal chos la de'i 'dabs su 'khor cig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-13: de nas de don 'dug pa la dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gzhan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-14: gzhan dag ston pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-15: de nas bram ze des mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:62b-17: 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag su dag cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-1: ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyam thos rnams yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-3: de nas bram ze des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-4: slob pa rnams kyang 'di kho na ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-5: dge sbyong gang ta ma lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-6: de ci 'dra ba zhig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i sems bskyed de; kye ma srod la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63a-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:63b-13: de nas bram ze des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la thams cad bsnyan do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:65a-5: de la ma dad pa'i mdza' sde gang yin pa de dag ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:65a-15: chos nyan pa la chags shing 'khod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:65b-8: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i yon tan rnams ji lta bu yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:65b-16: thos nas kyang de rnams kyis de la karsha pa na brgya phrag du ma byin na; ;bram ze'i khye'u de yang de rnams kyi nang du zhugs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:67b-9: bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:68b-2: bdag la nor mi dgos kyi /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:70a-20: snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:70a-22: de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:74b-4: de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:74b-5: dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:75b-0: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas ba des thabs zlar bab pa @75b las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:75b-2: bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:75b-3: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:75b-26: bya ba la gsal ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:75b-33: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:76a-8: de nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:76a-11: kye ma de yang 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:76a-12: chos 'di lta bu dag kyang thob na ci ma rung snyam mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:76b-1: de'i pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas khyim bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-3: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal po chen po khyod 'jig rten long ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-5: ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-9: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-13: sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-15: bu dang ri yig cong rong glud //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-16: 'thab dang rnyis bzung gong ma sreg /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-17: pha dang mi rgod sha za dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-18: dbang po'i mgo ni tha ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-20: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-21: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-22: de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:80b-24: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-0: de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming @81a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-6: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-8: tshva chu dang 'dra ste; ci tsam du bsten pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-9: de nas phyis kyang mthar gyis bram ze de'i bu gcig dang gnyis nas bdun gyi bar du byung nas de rnams rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-14: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-23: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-25: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-26: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-28: mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-32: kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81a-33: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste bram ze de'i khyim na nor ci yod pa de dag thams cad so sor bgos nas bu de dag la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-0: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de'i chung ma yang shi @81b bram ze de yang rgas te mig gis mi mthong bar gyur nas de bu de rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-1: de gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing 'tsho bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-3: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-4: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-6: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-7: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-8: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-9: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-10: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-11: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-12: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-13: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-14: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te; su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-25: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:81b-33: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-1: ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-2: su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-3: su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-4: su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-5: su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-6: su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-7: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-8: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-9: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-10: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas snga dro chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-12: sham thabs gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-13: bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs pa na bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-14: 'khar ba dang snod thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du slong ba de gzigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-15: gzigs nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82a-16: bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-0: khyod ci'i phyir 'khar ba @82b dang snod thogs shing gzhan gyi khyim du slong zhing 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-3: bdag gi bu bdun mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-4: de rnams bdag gis gsos nas bskyed bsrings nas thos pas kyang mthar phyin par bgyis te bzhag nas mchis brang dang bcas te btsems te bdag gi khyim na ci bdog pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis so sor bgos te stsal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-5: de rnams kyis bdag khyim nas bskrad pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-6: 'khar ba dang snod thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing rgyu bar bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-9: khyod kyis nga las tshigs su bcad pa bslabs te kun chub par byas la bu de rnams 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa la bsgrags par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-12: bdag gis rdo thogs zhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-14: gang dag btsas nas dgar gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-15: gang phyir nor ni kun bsags pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-16: de dag bdag gis tshems dang sbyar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-17: bdag ni khyim nas bskrad par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-18: nor zad pa na gang dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-19: bdag spangs de dag bden mo min //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-20: srin po'i bu yi cha lugs can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-21: pha pha zhes brjod de mi brjid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:82b-22: rta rgan zho sha zas pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-0: na tshod yal bar gyur pa @83a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-1: na; ;gzhon nu rnams kyi pha rgan zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-2: gzhan gyi khyim du slong bar gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-3: rten la ma phan bu rnams pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-5: 'khar ba yi yi yon tan mthus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-6: ba lang rdung zhing 'ong ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-7: sprul dang khyi za zlog par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-8: mun pa'i nang na mdun du 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-9: ya nga'i gnas su tshod kyang rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-10: rdeg 'chos na yang bdag la rton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-11: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa 'di dag thos nas bu rnams kyi 'khor du song ste brjod nas bu rnams kyis de thos ma thag tu pha la bzod pa gsol te snga mkho bzhin du khyim gyi bdag por bzhag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-12: de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-13: bdag gi dpal dang skal pa dang ldan pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-14: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de'i bka' drin yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-15: ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de la bshos gsol la rin thang che ba'i na bza' 'bul bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-16: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag gsol nas rin thang che ba'i na bza' phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-0: bu de rnams la de dang mthun pa'i chos @83b bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-1: des na bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-2: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal ma sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-4: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-5: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-6: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-9: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:83b-10: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-0: bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa 'di bu rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad nas 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnas su slar sor chud par mdzad nas @84a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-1: g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-2: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-4: 'das pa'i dus na yang bram ze 'di bu rnams kyis rang gi khyim nas bskrad pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-5: 'di ngas snga mkho'i gnas su bzhag nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-6: mngon par shes pa lnga ji ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer tsam pa zhes bya ba na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de la snga phyir bu bdun byung nas de dag gang gi tshe tsher skyes pa de'i tshe brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur nas khyim bdag des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste de ci bdog pa thams cad kyang so sor bgos nas de rnams la byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-9: khyim bdag de yang rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas de bu de rnams kyi khyim nas bskrad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-10: de rgas bzhin du zong khyer te yul gzhan du chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-11: de'i tshe dka' thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te; dka' thub kyi gnas de'i 'dabs shig tu 'ongs nas drang srong des khyim bdag de mthong nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84a-12: khyim bdag rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-0: khyod ci'i phyir @84b yul gzhan du chas te 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-1: de nas khyim bdag des gtam de drang srong de la rgyas par bsnyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-2: de nas drang srong gis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-4: khyod ngas ci nas bu de rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas drang srong des khyim bdag de phyir bzlog ste rang gi gnas su khrid nas drang srong des de'i bu rnams la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-5: des na bu de rnams kyis pha de khyim du bos nas snga mkho'i gnas su bzhag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-6: de nas khyim bdag des snga ma'i drin lan bsab pa'i phyir drang srong de la khyim du zan byin nas de'i thad du rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-7: de rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-8: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-11: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-13: de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-14: bram ze 'di kho na yin no; ;de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-15: bu 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-16: de'i tshe yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:84b-17: mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-1: la gtugs par gyur nas khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-2: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-3: der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-4: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-6: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te; de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-7: phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-9: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-10: rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas de 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-14: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-15: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85a-24: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-1: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-3: go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te yi ge mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-6: bya ba la gsal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-8: brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-9: de nas phyi zhig na de phas mdza' sde rnams kyi nang du btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-10: mdza' sde bo de rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-11: lta ba dang 'dod pa tha dad pa phan tshun mi mthun par smra ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-12: gang dag gang la dga' ba de dag de'i bsngags pa rjod par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-13: khyim bdag gi bu de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-14: rang bzhin gyis mdzangs pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-15: thams cad kyi gzhung lugs 'dri bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-17: la la ci zer bar gyur nas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag mi 'dod cing mi bzod la rung bar mi 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-18: de nas phyi zhig na dge bsnyen zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag gi bu des dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-19: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ba 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-21: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-22: de nas dge bsnyen des de dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:85b-23: des na khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la blta 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-0: de nas des thams cad bor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan @86a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-1: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-3: de thos nas khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-4: de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam 'jug rdzogs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-5: de nas phyi zhig na de sbyin pa gtong ba'i sems skyes la khyim na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-6: ci yang mi bdog par mthong nas de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-7: bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-8: gal te bdag gis lan gcig tsam rin po che'i gling bgrod pa sgrub nus par gyur na yang de lta na bde blag tu sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed nus so snyam nas tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu zong khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song nas des rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs te phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas pa las; de dag la rlung mi bzod ba byung nas des gru bo che ri'i gcong rong zhig tu btsangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86a-9: de nas rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs phyir log pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-0: tshong pa de dag 'jigs shing @86b skrag ste; bdag cag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-4: da bdag cag la dka' ba byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-5: srog phangs pa sbyin pa su yod ces 'dzer to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-6: de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dengs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-9: des bdag cag phongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-11: gnod pa dang phrad pa las skyabs mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-13: de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa de dag rnams sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-14: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-18: da ltar byung ba ci yang mi gzigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-20: thugs su ma chud pa ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-22: bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag la gnod pa dang phrad pa rnams kyi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas gru de rang nyid ri'i gtsong rong de nas phyir log ste rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:86b-24: de nas de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du byung nas mthar gyis mnyan du yod par song ste mnyan du yod par rdzas rnams bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-1: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'o byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-3: bdag cag la dka' ba mdzad mdzad pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-4: srog phangs pa stsol ba lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-5: zhes gsol nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-10: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-11: des na ded dpon la sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-12: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-14: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-15: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-16: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshigs gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87a-18: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-0: 'bad pas nyon mongs @87b la thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-1: de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa; nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-2: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-3: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-4: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-5: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-6: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-7: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-9: tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams ded dpon 'di la brten te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-10: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-12: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-13: 'das pa'i dus na yang tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams ded dpon 'di la brten te ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:87b-14: mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-0: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong @88a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-1: khyer w'a ra na si na dka' thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-2: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-3: de yang w'a ra na si na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos bkur sti bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-6: mchod par bya ba zhig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-7: de nas phyi zhig na w'a ra na si na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis drang srong de la bsnyen bkur byas nas rgya mtsho chen po nang du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-8: de dag gis rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas pa las; de dag gi gru bo che rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyis thang la 'phangs nas de dag der 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-9: bdag cag 'tsho ba'i dus skabs med do snyam nas de dag lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-10: de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-11: bdag cag gis lha gzhan dag la gsol ba gdab pa ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-12: bdag cag drang srong de nyid la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-13: 'on tang des bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-14: gnod pa dang phrad pa las skyabs byed par 'gyur zhing srog phangs pa sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88a-15: de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag drang srong de kho na la skyabs su dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-0: de nas drang srong de la dga' ba'i lhas drang srong de la @88b sbran nas drang srong des tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyung ste rang gi dka' thub kyi tshal du bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-1: de nas tshong pa rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-2: bdag cag gson por gyur pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-3: drang srong 'di'i mthu yin no snyam nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas thams cad drang srong de'i thad du rab tu byung ste de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-4: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-7: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-9: de'i tshe ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-10: tshong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-11: tshong ba 'di rnams kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-12: de'i tshe yang 'di rnams ded dpon 'di kho na la brten nas ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs te bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-13: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-14: da ltar yang 'di rnams ded dpon 'di la brten nas ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs te g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-15: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:88b-16: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-0: der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par @89a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-1: spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-2: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-4: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-5: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-6: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-7: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-8: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-9: khyim bdag de yang bu mi gshin pa zhig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-10: bu dang bu mo btsas so cog 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-12: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-13: des khyim bdag de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-14: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas sbyin pa dag sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-15: de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-17: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas khyim bdag des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89a-19: khye'u 'di'i tshe ring bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas de'i blo skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-0: rdzu 'phrul @89b che zhing bsod nams dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-1: che bar grags pa yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-2: 'di la bdag gi bu 'di g-yog tu phul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-3: 'di'i mthus tshe ring bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas pha ma gnyis kyis khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas de nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid cing gso bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-4: dge sbyong gi cha lugs su bcug nas dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bsod snyoms rgyu bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-5: de nas de gang gi tshe sheng bye bar gyur pa de'i tshe khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-6: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas khye'u de'i glud du gser dngul mang po phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-10: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-11: bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas khyim bdag des khye'u de'i chos gos tshon can rnams phud de khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-12: de nas de'i khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan bskon no cog mi snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:89b-13: chos gos tshon can de dag 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-1: nas gang gi tshe cha lugs de bsgyur ma nus pa de'i tshe dge slong gi cha lugs 'dug bzhin du gso bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-2: khyim de nyid du ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob tu bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-3: de nas de rang gi khyim der yang dga' ba med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-4: gzhan du lta ci smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-5: gtsug lag khang 'ba' zhig tu 'gro 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-6: de nas khyim bdag des bu de gtsug lag khang du khrid nas de nyid du gsos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-7: de nas des gtsug lag khang de nyid du bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur nas de phyir khyim du 'gro mi 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-8: gtsug lag khang na 'dug bzhin du des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-9: des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i thad du rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-10: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de la lung yang phog nas des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-12: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-13: dgra bcom par gyur nas bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90a-14: bdag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-0: des bltas na bdag gi pha ma la sogs pa ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya 'dul bar gyur pa mthong @90b nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te rang gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun nas sa brtol te byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-1: de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-2: dga' bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i khyir mdun du 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-3: de nas des pha ma gnyis kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-7: rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-8: des na pha ma de gnyis 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-9: bden pa mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-10: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-11: sbyin pa dag sbyin pa'i bgo sha yang byed du bcug nas khyim de khron pa dang 'dra bar byas te bzhag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-12: des ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya bo de dag kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-13: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-14: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-16: khyim bdag 'dis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:90b-17: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te @91a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-1: mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya bgyis la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-2: 'di nyid la brten nas pha ma la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-3: ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgyas bden pa mthong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-6: smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-9: 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-12: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-15: skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-18: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra na si na khyim bdag cig gnas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91a-19: phyi zhig na de'i bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-0: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe des yang @91b dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-1: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-2: de gang gi nyin bar btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par khyim bdag gzhan gyi bu lnga brgya yang btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-3: gang gi tshe de dag cher skyes pa de'i tshe brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-4: de nas de dag so so'i pha ma rnams kyis mdza' sde'i nang du btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-5: de nas phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus su mdza' sde bo de rnams skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa yal ga 'khrigs shing me tog rgyas pa'i nang du 'gro 'dod par gyur nas ne'u bla rnams kyis khye'u de sngon du gtang bar 'dod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-6: khyod sngar song la bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-7: bca' ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-8: bdag cag kyang don dag grub nas 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-10: de nas de der song nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-11: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag sta gon byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa yang sa phyogs de logs nas w'a ra na sir bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-13: de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:91b-14: mthong nas kyang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-0: yon gnas kyi mchog 'di lta bu bsod @92a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-1: snyoms la chas te gshegs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-2: bdag gis kyang tshegs chung ngus bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sbyar ba yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-3: bdag gis je yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la bshos gsol la de'i 'og tu bdag gis grogs po rnams kyi bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-4: bca' ba gzhan dag sbyar bar bya'o snyam nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal de nyid kyi nang du spyan drangs te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-5: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-8: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-9: de nas khye'u des mdza' sde bo rnams kyi phyir bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-10: bca' ba gzhan dag sta gon byed pa la zhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92a-11: de nas mdza' sde bo de rnams skyed mos tshal der lhags nas bdag cag gi bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-0: bca' ba sta gon byas pa de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @92b sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-2: de thos ma thag tu de dag shas cher khros te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-3: de dag khros nas khye'u de gsad par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-4: de nas khye'u de 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas drang srong smra bar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-5: des gnas de nas pha ma gnyis la bzlugs te pha ma gnyis kyis 'thab mo zhi bar bya bar brtsam pa las zhi bar byed ma nus nas khye'u des pha ma gnyis la gsol te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-6: de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum lobs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-7: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur nas des pha ma gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-8: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod nas sbyin pa dag spyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-9: de nas mdza' sde bo rnams kyis de rab tu byung ba mthong nas 'gyod pa skyes te bdag cag gis ma legs par byas so snyam nas de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-10: de las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-11: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-12: de nas phyi zhig na dge slong de nad kyis thebs nas de rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:92b-16: 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis rim gro byas kyang sos par byed ma nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-2: kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-5: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-6: de kho na'i bstan pa rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-7: de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza' sde bo de rnams kyang de'i mdun du 'dug par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-8: de rnams kyis kyang thos nas smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-9: bdag cag kyang khyod kho na la brten te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-10: mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93a-13: de'i tshe sde snod gsum par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gi bu 'di kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-0: de'i tshe pha ma gnyis @93b su gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni da lta'i pha ma gnyis kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-1: de'i tshe mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni da ltar gyi ne'u ldang lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-2: des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-4: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-7: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-8: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-9: der de'i pha ma gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-10: mdza' sde bo de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-11: da ltar yang 'di kho na la brten nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas so; ;las brgya tham pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-12: bam po sum cu gnyis pa ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-14: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-15: de'i tshe yul ko sa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-16: yul ma ga dha'i bar mtshams nas sengge mthu rtsal bdo ba gnyis 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:93b-17: de gnyis de na 'dug pas skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-0: de gnyis kyis la mchod pas su yang @94a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-1: lam der 'gro mi nus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-3: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-4: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-6: 'gro ba ldar grol ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-7: skye mched drug la mkhas pa; byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba; rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-8: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-9: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-10: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-11: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-12: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-23: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-25: ngan song du gzhol; su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94a-30: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-0: nyes @94b par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-2: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya; su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las smin par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-9: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-10: rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-11: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-12: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-13: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sengge de gnyis gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:94b-16: khyod song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga dha'i phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-0: su bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos longs shig ces sgos shig ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas shing dbyar bzhugs nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun @95a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-1: cis [?] mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i khab tu chas te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs gshegs nas sengge'i nags khung du byon nas sengge de gnyis zas tshol du song song ba las de gnyis phrad nas 'thab par chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyang de gnyis la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mdun logs su gzhes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-3: de nas thag ring po zhig nas sengge de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-4: mthong nas kyang sengge de gnyis kyi khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-5: bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-8: khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes par spyod pa'i las kyis dud 'gro'i nang du skyes na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-9: khyed gnyis da ltar yang de 'ba' zhig gi rgyu byed cing 'dug gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95a-17: nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-0: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur @95b yang srid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-1: zhes bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-2: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das las chos thos nas kha 'tshos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-3: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams ni; me'i drod che ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-4: bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyes bzhin du shi nas lha'i nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-5: lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-6: chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-9: las gang gis skyes snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-10: de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-11: lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-12: bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de gnyis kyis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-13: de nas de gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-14: bdag cag gnyis zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-15: bdag cag gnyis kyi cha ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-16: bdag cag gnyis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-17: de nas sngon sengger gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul rgyan thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-18: lus do shal dang se mo dos rgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-19: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:95b-20: lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de gnyis kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-1: rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te de gnyis kyis chos thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-3: de gnyis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-4: de nas dge slong rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-7: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-10: lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96a-13: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am; lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-0: lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig pa la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin @96b gyi; dge slong dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-1: khyed kyis nags khung dgon pa na sengge gnyis phan tshun 'thab cing 'dug pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-5: bka' stsal pa; ngas de gnyis la chos bstan te de gnyis kyis nga las chos thos nas kha 'tshos te de gnyis shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-6: lhar gyur nas nga'i thang du 'ongs te de gnyis la ngas chos bstan nas nga las chos thos pa des na de dag gis bden pa rnams mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-7: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis sengge de gnyis kyi 'khon byang bar mdzad de mtho ris dang thar pa thob par mdzad la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-10: yul 'khor gnyis kyi 'jigs pa bsal ba la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-12: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-13: 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di gnyis kyi 'khon byang bar byas nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-14: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-15: yul 'khor gnyis kyi 'jigs pa yang ji ltar bsal ba de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:96b-17: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-0: bi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sde gnyis @97a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-1: phan tshun mi mthun par gyur nas de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-2: de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'i phyir sa mtshams na 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-3: de gnyis 'khod pa'i 'dab na dka' thub kyi nags shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-4: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas pa des de gnyis la snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las 'ongs nas de gnyis kyi bar mtshams su 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-5: de nas drang srong de mthong nas de gnyis kyi khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas drang srong de la shas cher dga' bar gyur to; ;de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas drang srong de la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-9: rgyal po de gnyis kyis smras pa; drang srong gis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-10: zhes smras nas mjal dum byas te drang srong gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir drang srong gi mdun du 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97a-11: drang srong des kyang de gnyis la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-0: des na rgyal po de gnyis so so'i bu rab rgyal sar bcug nas drang srong @97b de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-1: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-4: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-6: de'i tshe ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-7: bi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni; sengge 'di gnyis kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-8: de'i tshe yang ngas de gnyis kyi 'khon byang bar byas nas rab tu byung ste bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-9: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-10: da ltar yang ngas 'dis gnyis kyi 'khon byang bar byas nas mtho ris dang thar pa thob par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-13: 'di gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-14: las de'i rnam par smin pas sengger skyes lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-16: de nas shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes la 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-19: da ltar gyi las kyang yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di gnyis dge bsnyen du gyur te kha mi mkhas pa des 'di gnyis khros pas skye bo mang po la dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig smras la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:97b-22: der 'di gnyis kyis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-0: @98a *// bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-2: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-5: de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-6: sengge 'di nyid kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-7: de gnyis kyis der skye bo mang po la dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-9: de gnyis kyis der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-10: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-12: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-15: thabs mnyam pa brnyes nas 'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-16: 'das pa'i dus kyi las yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-17: da ltar byung ba'i las gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-18: 'di gnyis sengger gyur nas nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des na lha'i nang du skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98a-20: da ltar byung ba'i las yin no ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-0: rnyis @98b bzung zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-1: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-2: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na nags khrod cig na ri dvags kyi rngon pa dag cig gis ri dvags bshor ba'i phyir rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-5: rnyi mang po dag btsugs nas der ri dvags mang po zhig bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-6: rngon pa de dag kyang nang bar sngar langs te nags khrod der song nas de dag gis der ri dvags ci zin pa rnams mda' 'phangs te bsad nas de dag las nyung shas shig lus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-7: de'i tshe sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das kyang gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-8: de nas ri dvags de rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-9: rngon pa de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-10: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-11: dga' bar gyur nas rngon pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-16: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te; des na rngon pa de rnams kyis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:98b-17: de dag gis bden pa mthong nas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-1: pa; bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-2: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-4: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-6: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-7: ri dvags de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te dus las 'das nas lha'i nang du skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-8: lha'i bu'am; lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-9: chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-12: las gang gis skyes snyam mo; ;de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-13: lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-14: bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-15: de nas de dag gis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-16: bdag cag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99a-17: bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-0: bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan @99b 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-1: de nas sngon ri dvags su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul rgyan thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-2: lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa; nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-3: lus gur gum dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pha de dag gis de nyid kyi mtshen mo lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-7: mand'a ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-9: de dag gis chos thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-10: de dag gi bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-11: de nas dge slong rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-14: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:99b-15: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-1: bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-4: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-5: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-7: lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-9: khyed kyis nags khung dgon pa na ri dvags lnga brgya rngon pa rnams kyis mda' 'phangs te bsad pa mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-14: de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi 'phos nas dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te lhar gyur nas nga'i thad du 'ongs te de dag langs chos bstan nas nga las chos thos pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-15: de dag gis bden pa rnams mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-16: de dag gis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100a-21: ri dvags de dag gis las ci bgyis na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-3: dge slong 'thab grol can kha mi mkhas pa sha stag tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-4: dge slong dag la der de rnams kyis gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-5: kha cig gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-6: gang dag gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa de dag ni; dud 'gror skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-7: gang dag gis gdol ba zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-9: der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-10: de ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-11: gong ma sreg ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-14: sprang po lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:100b-15: nags khrod cig tu lam byung ste bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i tshe nags khrod de'i nang gi gnas su me chen po 'bar nas der skye bo phal po che dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-1: cag ni; 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i skabs med do snyam mo //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu me zhi bar gyur nas tshong ba de dag bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-16: dga' bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-18: des na de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101a-19: dro bar gyur pa bskyed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-0: bden pa dang mthun pa'i @101b bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-1: 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-2: mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-4: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-5: kha cig gis ni; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-7: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-9: rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-11: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-13: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-19: nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-21: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-24: 'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-27: dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do //
