K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:101b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che zhugs kyis tshig par gyur pa las thar par mdzad nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-1: pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-3: de ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te; 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas dud 'gro phal po che me'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs nas ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-5: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nags khrod cig na bya phal po che gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-6: de nas nags khrod der shing skam po gcig la gcig drud pa las me byung nas bya de dag gi nang nas 'gro nus pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-11: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gong ma sreg tu skyes pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-12: byang chub sems dpa' des thag ring po zhig nas me 'bar zhing 'ong bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-13: mthong nas kyang de sems can de dag la snying rje skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-14: bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal dang phrad pa 'di rnams kyi phyir yang brtson 'grus ma bskyed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102a-15: bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las ji ltar bsgral bar bya snyam du bsam nas byang chub sems dpa' des 'dab ma chur sbangs nas me chen po'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug ste 'dab ma sprugs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-2: 'di dag rkang pa yod mod kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-5: me khyod sdod la ma 'gul cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-6: bden dang bden tshig gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-7: bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-8: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-9: me khyod sdod la ma 'gul cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-10: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don gyi phyir ni dga' zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-11: mthong nas kyang des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-13: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-14: sems can la phan pa'i phyir ni dga' zhing 'dug gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-15: ma la bdag gis grogs bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis char mo che phab ste me de zhi bar gyur nas sems can de dag thams cad me'i 'jigs pa las thar par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-18: de'i tshe bya gong ma sreg tu gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-20: de'i tshe nags khrod de na gnas pa'i sems can du gyur pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-21: skye po phal po che 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:102b-22: de'i tshe yang ngas de dag me'i 'jigs pa las thar par byas te 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-1: las thar bar byas nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-2: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-3: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad kha cig ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-7: der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-8: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-10: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-11: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag nor can zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-12: yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-13: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-14: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-16: khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103a-24: smin ma sdug pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-0: khye'u de @103b bcas ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches bltas na sdug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-1: de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-2: khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches bltas na sdug par gyur pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-3: de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming blta na sdug ces gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-5: de nas khye'u blta na sdug 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-9: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas rgyal po'i khab thams cad du de'i grags pa rgyas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-10: de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas mthar gyis gdul bar bya ba'i don mdzad cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa de'i tshe der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od ma'i tshal bzhes nas sems can stong phrag du ma skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-11: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-12: skye bo mang po de dag kyang sde tshan nas sde tshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-13: pha tshan nas pha tshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-14: dga' sde nas dga' sder dus dus su bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-15: phyin chad khye'u de blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-16: de nas phyi zhig na khye'u blta na sdug gis dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:103b-18: skye ba mang po 'di dag nga blta ba'i phyir 'ong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-4: da ltar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba de su zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-7: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rgyas par brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de ngo mtshar du gyur te bdag pas ches blta na sdug pa de ji lta bu zhig snyam nas pha ma gnyis la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-10: bdag bcom ldan 'das de lta ba'i slad du mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-11: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-14: zhes smras nas pha ma gnyis khye'u de khrid de 'od ma'i tshal du song nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-15: me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-16: me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-17: mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-18: mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-19: blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104a-20: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas de la pha'i 'du shes kyang byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-0: des pha @104b [?] bzhes sgra phyung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te pha tsam du 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-1: de'i pha ma gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-3: de nas khyim bdag nor can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-4: de'i chung mas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas khye'u de'i lag pa nas bzung ste 'gro zhes byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-5: khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas 'bral bar ma nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-6: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-7: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi khyim du spyan drangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-8: thabs des na 'di bdag cag gis khyim du dkri nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-9: dgung bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:104b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-0: de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang @105a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-1: bar rig nas chung ma la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-3: song la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas sta gon gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-6: zhes byas nas khyim bdag de khye'u de dang lhan cig tu 'od ma'i tshal du mtshan mo dgongs mal btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-7: chung mas kyang de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-8: bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba; btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-9: bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i bkang sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105a-11: de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-0: bca' ba gtsang ma @105b bzang po sangs [?] pos tshim par byas te bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-4: bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-9: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-10: des na khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la bkhod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-11: de ltar bden pa mthong nas khye'u des pha ma gnyis la gsol te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-13: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-14: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:105b-15: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog @106a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-1: ste; des kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-3: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-4: de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-5: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-6: tsandan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-7: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-8: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-9: srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-10: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-11: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-13: bcom ldan 'das byis pa stong phrag du ma mthong yang su yang 'di kho na ltar bcom ldan 'das la mjal bar mi bgyid lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106a-16: nga'i 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar bur gyur pas na; sngon gyi bag chags de kho nas 'di nga la mjal bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-0: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la @106b longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-1: 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-2: 'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis nas mi mnyes par ma bgyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-7: 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-10: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-11: bde bar gsheg pa; 'jig rten pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-12: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-13: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:106b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-0: der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe rgyal po mdzes pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi phyir gtsug lag khang rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig byas nas @107a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-2: rgyal po mdzes pa de'i lugs kyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-3: nyin gcig bzhin du 'khor dang cas te gtsug lag khang du 'gro zhing gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-4: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po mdzes pa de gtsug lag khang du song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-5: bya ba zhig byung nas des bu thu bo bskos te deng khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi byi dor gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyal po song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-6: de nas rgyal po'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed pa la zhugs pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis ci nas rgyal po'i bu des nyi ma nub kyi bar du yang gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed mi nus pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas de gtsug lag de nyid du dgong mal btab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-8: de der dgong ma la btab nas dge slong rnams cho 'phrul dag byed pa yang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-9: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'ong ba yang mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-10: de nas de mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas gtsug lag khang de nyid na dge slong dag gi rim gro byed pa la brtson par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107a-11: phyir grong khyer du 'gro mi 'dod par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-0: de der lo lnga stong gi bar du dge slong rnams @107b la rim gro byed cing 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-1: byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bskyed nas des tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-2: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-4: bdag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-5: mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-6: de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-9: de'i tshe rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-11: des der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-13: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:107b-16: thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-0: nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad @108a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-1: spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-2: des der byams pa bsgoms pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa des ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-3: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-4: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-5: der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-6: dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-7: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-8: mi rgod ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-9: gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-10: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na shing s'a la'i nags khung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-11: mi rgod lnga brgya tsam zhig khro zhing gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-12: de dag de na 'khod pas skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-13: de nas phyi zhig na der 'gron po mang po dag cig bcom nas tshong pa rnams rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du dong ste rgyal po la gsol nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu 'phags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang sbrags te der btang nas des mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag gson por bzung ste 'ongs nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108a-14: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi rgod lnga brgya gsod du btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-0: gshed ma rnams kyis mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag gsad pa'i sar @108b khrid pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-1: rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-2: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-4: 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-5: skye mched drug la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-6: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-7: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-8: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-9: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-10: yang dag pa'i sengge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-11: chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-12: mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-24: phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-25: su ni; ngan song du gzhol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-31: ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:108b-32: su ni; nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-0: 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug @109a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya; su ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-7: sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-8: rgyal mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-9: dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-10: gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-11: sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod lnga brgya gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-13: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-14: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109a-19: rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de rnams ma gsad par thong zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-0: gal te rab tu 'byung na gtang @109b bar 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-1: zhes gsol nas de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag phyir bzlog ste bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid nas rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-3: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-5: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-6: de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod lnga brgya srog phangs pa stsal te g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-9: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-11: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-12: 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di rnams srog phangs pa byin te ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-13: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul bi de ha zhes bya ba na rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-16: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas ri dvags bshor du song ba las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:109b-17: rgyal po de la blon po lta brgyas glags btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-0: @110a *// da ni; rgyal po 'di bdag cag gi lag na 'dug gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-1: 'di na 'dug pa kho na'i tshe bdag cag gis 'di gsad do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-3: dgra dang zun gyi nang na 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-4: der gzhan dag gis rgyal po la sbrang nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dbang chen sdes blon po lnga brgya po de dag gsod du btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-5: de dag gshed ma rnams kyis khrid nas nags khrod cig tu zhugs te gsad ces byas pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-6: nags khrod de na drang srong zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-7: drang srong des blon po lnga brgya po de dag rgyal po dbang chen sde la gtong du bcug nas dka' thub kyi gnas su khrid de rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-8: rab tu byung nas de dag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-9: mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do; ;dge slong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-11: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-13: de'i tshe blon po lnga brgyar gyur pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-14: rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-15: de'i tshe yang de dag gsod du btang ba las srog phangs pa byin te bsam gtan bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-16: mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-17: da ltar yang 'di rnams ngas srog byin nas g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110a-18: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-0: gzhan @110b yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di rnams rab tu byung nas 'di rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-1: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-2: sha za zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-3: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-4: de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na sha za stong gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-5: de dag gis de phyogs su 'grul bcad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-7: yul ko sa la'i skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do; ;de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nyas bzlugs te mnyan du yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-8: rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na sha za stong gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-9: de dag de na 'khod pas yul gnyis la gnod pa chen po byed pa khyod kyis shes sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyi khams na bzhugs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-11: sha za de rnams kyi phyir khyod kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:110b-13: de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-0: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying @111a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-1: po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-4: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-5: chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-8: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-9: de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-12: nye dga' la sogs pa yang btul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-13: gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog gnas la sogs pa yang btul na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-15: yul ko sa la gnyis kyi bar mtshams na sha za'i tshogs chen po gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-16: de dag de na 'khod pas skye bo mang po la gnod pa bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za'i tshogs de dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gdul bar gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-0: @111b de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za de rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te s'a la'i nags khung sha za rnams kyi 'dabs su gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-2: de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-3: mthong nas kyang gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur te shugs chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi thog tu brgyugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-5: kye ma rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:111b-6: de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-0: gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog gzhan dag gis sha za'i tshogs rnams gtses nas de dag 'jigs shing skrag ste phan tshun du 'byer bar brtsams pa @112a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-1: las; bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gdul ba'i phyir kho ra khor yug nas me chen po sprul nas de dag gis bdag cag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mthong ste 'bros kyang ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ste skyabs tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor te 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za de rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-3: khyed sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis sha za'i skye gnas dma' bar skyes la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-4: da ltar yang khyed skye bo mang po la gnod par byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-5: 'di nas shi 'phos na khyed kyi 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bka' ci stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-14: da phyin chad sdig pa'i las 'or la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-16: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-17: sha za rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-19: zhes gsol nas sha za de rnams kyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112a-20: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te de phyin chad sdig pa'i las spangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-0: @112b de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dag dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas shing s'a la'i nag khung nas mi snang bar gyur te 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-1: sha za de rnams kyang bla na med pa'i lam la gnas par gyur nas phan tshun 'drul ba rnams la chu sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-2: kha zas kyang sbyin par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-3: lam stor ba rnams la yang lam ston par byed do; ;de nas yul ka shi dang yul ko sa la'i mi rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar gdul dka' ba 'di dag btul lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-5: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za 'di dag kyang btul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-8: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin du stsal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-9: skye bo phal po che la yang sman yon btags pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-11: de ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-12: 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams sdig pa'i las las bzlog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-13: ji ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas phyogs 'di nyid na sha za'i tshogs chen po gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:112b-16: de dag 'di na gnas pas yul ka shi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-0: yul ko sa la'i mi rnams ma rungs par byed pa las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na dka' @113a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-1: thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-2: skye bo mang po de dag gis sha za de dag gdul ba'i phyir drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas drang srong des sha za de dag btul te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-5: de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-7: de'i tshe sha zar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-8: sha za 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-9: de'i tshe yang ngas 'di dag btul te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-10: da ltar yang ngas 'di dag sdig pa'i las las bzlog ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-12: bam po sum cu gsum pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-13: dbang po'i mgo zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-14: gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-15: de'i tshe yul yangs pa can na 'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgo ces bya ba; 'phong gi rig pa thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa zhig gnas pa des li tsa b'i lnga brgya la 'phong gi rig pa bslabs nas de dag kyang de la mthar phyin par gyur te stobs po cher yang gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-16: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113a-17: yangs ba can na gnas pa rnams 'gras par gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-0: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams @113b kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g-yul 'gyed pa'i phyir yangs pa can na gnas pa rnams kyi steng du drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-1: de nas 'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgos rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis g-yul 'gyed pa'i phyir bdag cag gi steng du drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-3: thos nas kyang g-yul dgyed pa'i phyir 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi dmag gi steng du drangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-4: de dag gis drangs nas skye bo mang po kha btag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-5: de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dmag rnams bros so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-6: de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan lnga'i bar du rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo mang po rnams kha btag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-7: de nas 'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgos mi lnga stong mda' 'phangs te bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-8: zhes thog thog tu grags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-9: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-12: bdag cag gi dgra ma lags pa'i dgra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-13: 'gran zla ma lags pa'i 'gran zla lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-16: mi lnga stong tsam kha btags lags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du dbang po'i mgo gdul bar gsol zhes byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:113b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-1: po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te yangs pa can du gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas phyin chad dbang po'i mgo 'phong mi shes pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas de rmongs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-3: ci'i phyir bdag 'di kho na ltar ma rungs par gyur snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-4: de nas des ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs pa las dgyes bzhin du yangs pa can du gshegs pa thos nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-7: thams cad gzigs pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-8: de ci'i phyir bdag 'phong gi rig pa mi shes par gyur pa thugs su chud do snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114a-13: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'a chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-0: des na dbang po'i mgos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo @114b mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-1: des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-3: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-4: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-5: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-8: re zhig slob ma rnams la sbron cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-9: de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-10: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:114b-14: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste de yangs pa can du song nas li tsa b'i lnga brgya po rnams ci nas de dag thams cad rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-0: de nas de rnams kyis pha ma la gsol te dbang po'i mgo dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i @115a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gis bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-6: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-7: des na li tsa b'i lnga brgya po de rnams kyis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-8: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-10: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-11: bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-12: bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung te bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115a-14: de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-0: 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum @115b du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-1: de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po'i mgo la brten nas li tsa b'i lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-5: 'das pa'i dus na yang dbang po'i mgo la sogs pa li tsa b'i lnga brgya po 'di rnams ngas sdig pa las bzlog ste ji ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-7: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer gru 'dzin ces bya ba na rgyal po dbang chen zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-8: de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-10: bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-12: gser gyi kha dog can; mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-17: smin ma stug pa zhig btsas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-18: de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-19: khye'u 'di dbang chen gyi bu yin pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:115b-20: khye'u 'di'i ming dbang chen sde zhes gdags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-1: de nas khye'u dbang chen sde 'o ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-5: mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-6: de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-7: las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-8: glang po che zhon pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-14: g-yul las thar par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-18: rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-19: mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-30: gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-31: tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116a-33: pha dang blon po lnga brgya po de rnams chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed nas des bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-0: bdag gis rgyal srid btang la dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste pha ma @116b la gsol nas nags 'dabs su gnas bcas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-1: de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha shi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-2: de shi nas nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis yul du gnod pa byed pa la zhugs nas blon po rnams kyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-3: bdag cag jo bo med pa'i phyir nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gnod pa byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-4: rgyal po'i sras spyan drangs te rgyal sar gzhug go snyam nas rgyal po'i bu de'i thad du blon po chen po song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-5: des rgyal po'i bu la smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-9: yab kyi rgyal srid bzhes su gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-11: gal te khyod dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-12: de'i 'og tu byas pas sla'o zhes byas nas des blon po chen po de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-13: blon po chen po des kyang blon po lnga brgya po de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-14: de nas rgyal po'i bu de spyan drangs nas rgyal sar bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-15: de nas de der 'ongs pas yul khams na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-18: de'i tshe rgyal por gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-20: de'i tshe blon po chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:116b-21: dbang po'i mgo 'di kho na yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-0: de'i tshe blon po lnga brgya por gyur pa @117a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-1: gang yin pa de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-2: li tsa b'i lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-3: de'i tshe yang ngas dbang po'i mgo 'di kho na la brten nas blon po lnga brgya po rnams sdig pa las bzlog ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-4: da ltar yang ngas li tsa b'i lnga brgya po 'di rnams dbang po'i mgo 'di la brten nas sdig pa las bzlog ste g-yung drung gi mthar thug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-5: grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-6: gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-7: da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-9: sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-11: brgya byin rgyal po rngon pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-12: rmos pa dang ni bram ze gsum; ;khyab 'jug dang ni 'thab mo klu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-13: shi bi gnyis dang ko'u shambhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-14: brgya byin zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-15: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-16: chos nyid kyis na lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe nye ba'i snga stas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117a-18: rang gi 'od dang ldan pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-1: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-5: me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams rlung gis bskyod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-6: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-7: de'i tshe de dag gi sgra yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-8: lha rnams kyi gos la reg na 'jam pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-9: de'i tshe de dag gi gos reg na rtsub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-10: lha rnams kyi lus la dri ma mi 'chags pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-11: de'i tshe de dag gi lus la dri ma 'chags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-12: lha rnams kyi mig mi 'dzum pa yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-13: de'i tshe de dag gi mig 'dzum par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-14: nye ba'i ltas lnga la ma gtogs pa 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-15: gos rnams la dri ma mi 'chags pa las; dri ma 'chags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-16: me tog phreng rnams mi rnyis pa las rnyis par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-17: lus las dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-18: mchan khung gnyis las rdul 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-19: lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ba na rang gi stan la 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-20: de nas phyi zhig na lha'i dbang po brgya byin la nye ba'i ltas lnga po rnams byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-21: des nye ba'i ltas de dag byung bar tshor nas tshor ma thag tu de shas cher 'jigs pa skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:117b-22: da su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-0: su zhig gis bdag gnas 'di nas shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur @118a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-1: bar nus shig gu snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-2: de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-5: dge sbyong dang bram ze khong dge ba'i rang bzhin can du bkur pa rnams la thabs ci zhig gis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-6: bdag gnas 'di nas 'pho bar mi 'gyur zhes smros shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-7: de dag nyid la skyabs su bzhud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-8: de nas de thos ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-10: bram ze gzhan dang gzhan dag gi thad du song nas thabs ci zhig gis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-11: lha'i bu 'chi 'pho bar gyur ba las 'chi 'pho bar mi 'gyur zhes dris na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-12: de dag gis de nyid la khyod su yin zhes phyir dris so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-14: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-15: de nas de dag gzhi de las dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-16: mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-17: bdag cag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin bltar 'ongs pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-18: bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-19: zhes zer nas de dag de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do; ;de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118a-21: 'di rnams la 'dri bar 'dod cing skyabs su 'gro bar 'dod pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-0: 'di dag bdag la @118b skyabs su 'gro bar byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-2: bram ze 'di dag lta bu la 'dri ci dgos snyam nas re thag chad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-3: de dag la re ba med par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-4: de nas de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-5: gzigs pa bzhis 'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rigs drug tu tshig tu rjod cing kun tu sgra bsgrags te grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-7: 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len cing 'gro ba rnams kyang bdud rtsis tshim par byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-8: khyed las su bdud rtsi 'dod pa de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba longs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-9: der ngas khyed la bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-10: zhes byas nas byang chub sems dpas yum gyi lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-11: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-12: bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-13: byang chub sems dpa' 'dis yum gyi lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-14: de gang gi tshe bltams pa de'i tshe bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-15: de'i 'og tu bdag gis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas des lha'i bu bzhi de'i srung mar btang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:118b-16: bdag nyid kyang dus dus su byang chub sems dpa'i thad du bsrung ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-0: bltams pa'i mod la yang bdag nyid kyis @119a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-2: sku cher skyes pa'i tshe yang des skyo ba bskyed de nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-3: byang chub kyi snying por yang bsrung ba'i phyir song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-4: de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas lnga sde dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-6: grong gi byis pa stod rim lnga bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-7: bzang sde'i sde tshan rnams btul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-9: dga' stobs ma bden pa rnams la bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-11: chu klung 'od srung spun rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-12: g-yar gshegs nas cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum bstan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-13: 'od ma'i nags khrod du rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-074-001:119a-15: yul ma ga dha'i bram ze dang /
